110/*
111==================
112BotSetUserInfo
113==================
114*/
115void BotSetUserInfo(bot_state_t *bs, char *key, char *value) {
116 char userinfo[MAX_INFO_STRING];
117
118 trap_GetUserinfo(bs->client, userinfo, sizeof(userinfo));
119 Info_SetValueForKey(userinfo, key, value);
120 trap_SetUserinfo(bs->client, userinfo);
121 ClientUserinfoChanged( bs->client );
122}
123
124/*
125==================
126BotCTFCarryingFlag
127==================
128*/
129int BotCTFCarryingFlag(bot_state_t *bs) {
130 if (gametype != GT_CTF) return CTF_FLAG_NONE;
131
132 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_REDFLAG] > 0) return CTF_FLAG_RED;
133 else if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BLUEFLAG] > 0) return CTF_FLAG_BLUE;
134 return CTF_FLAG_NONE;
135}
136
137/*
138==================
139BotTeam
140==================
141*/
142int BotTeam(bot_state_t *bs) {
143
144 if (bs->client < 0 || bs->client >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
145 return qfalse;
146 }
147
148 if (level.clients[bs->client].sess.sessionTeam == TEAM_RED) {
149 return TEAM_RED;
150 } else if (level.clients[bs->client].sess.sessionTeam == TEAM_BLUE) {
151 return TEAM_BLUE;
152 }
153
154 return TEAM_FREE;
155}
156
157/*
158==================
159BotOppositeTeam
160==================
161*/
162int BotOppositeTeam(bot_state_t *bs) {
163 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
164 case TEAM_RED: return TEAM_BLUE;
165 case TEAM_BLUE: return TEAM_RED;
166 default: return TEAM_FREE;
167 }
168}
169
170/*
171==================
172BotEnemyFlag
173==================
174*/
175bot_goal_t *BotEnemyFlag(bot_state_t *bs) {
176 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) {
177 return &ctf_blueflag;
178 }
179 else {
180 return &ctf_redflag;
181 }
182}
183
184/*
185==================
186BotTeamFlag
187==================
188*/
189bot_goal_t *BotTeamFlag(bot_state_t *bs) {
190 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) {
191 return &ctf_redflag;
192 }
193 else {
194 return &ctf_blueflag;
195 }
196}

199/*
200==================
201EntityIsDead
202==================
203*/
204qboolean EntityIsDead(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
205 playerState_t ps;
206
207 if (entinfo->number >= 0 && entinfo->number < MAX_CLIENTS) {
208 //retrieve the current client state
209 if (!BotAI_GetClientState(entinfo->number, &ps)) {
210 return qfalse;
211 }
212
213 if (ps.pm_type != PM_NORMAL) return qtrue;
214 }
215 return qfalse;
216}
217
218/*
219==================
220EntityCarriesFlag
221==================
222*/
223qboolean EntityCarriesFlag(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
224 if ( entinfo->powerups & ( 1 << PW_REDFLAG ) )
225 return qtrue;
226 if ( entinfo->powerups & ( 1 << PW_BLUEFLAG ) )
227 return qtrue;
228#ifdef MISSIONPACK
229 if ( entinfo->powerups & ( 1 << PW_NEUTRALFLAG ) )
230 return qtrue;
231#endif
232 return qfalse;
233}
234
235/*
236==================
237EntityIsInvisible
238==================
239*/
240qboolean EntityIsInvisible(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
241 // the flag is always visible
242 if (EntityCarriesFlag(entinfo)) {
243 return qfalse;
244 }
245 if (entinfo->powerups & (1 << PW_INVIS)) {
246 return qtrue;
247 }
248 return qfalse;
249}
250
251/*
252==================
253EntityIsShooting
254==================
255*/
256qboolean EntityIsShooting(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
257 if (entinfo->flags & EF_FIRING) {
258 return qtrue;
259 }
260 return qfalse;
261}
262
263/*
264==================
265EntityIsChatting
266==================
267*/
268qboolean EntityIsChatting(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
269 if (entinfo->flags & EF_TALK) {
270 return qtrue;
271 }
272 return qfalse;
273}

276==================
277EntityHasQuad

280qboolean EntityHasQuad(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
281 if (entinfo->powerups & (1 << PW_QUAD)) {
282 return qtrue;
283 }
284 return qfalse;
285}

300/*
301==================
302EntityCarriesCubes
303==================
304*/
305qboolean EntityCarriesCubes(aas_entityinfo_t *entinfo) {
306 entityState_t state;
307
308 if (gametype != GT_HARVESTER)
309 return qfalse;
310 //FIXME: get this info from the aas_entityinfo_t ?
311 BotAI_GetEntityState(entinfo->number, &state);
312 if (state.generic1 > 0)
313 return qtrue;
314 return qfalse;
315}

317/*
318==================
319Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag
320==================
321*/
322int Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bot_state_t *bs) {
323 if (gametype != GT_1FCTF) return qfalse;
324
325 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_NEUTRALFLAG] > 0) return qtrue;
326 return qfalse;
327}

330==================

335 if (gametype != GT_HARVESTER) return qfalse;

343/*
344==================
345BotRememberLastOrderedTask
346==================
347*/
348void BotRememberLastOrderedTask(bot_state_t *bs) {
349 if (!bs->ordered) {
350 return;
351 }
352 bs->lastgoal_decisionmaker = bs->decisionmaker;
353 bs->lastgoal_ltgtype = bs->ltgtype;
354 memcpy(&bs->lastgoal_teamgoal, &bs->teamgoal, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
355 bs->lastgoal_teammate = bs->teammate;
356}
357
358/*
359==================
360BotSetTeamStatus
361==================
362*/
363void BotSetTeamStatus(bot_state_t *bs) {
364#ifdef MISSIONPACK
365 int teamtask;
366 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
367
368 teamtask = TEAMTASK_PATROL;
369
370 switch(bs->ltgtype) {
371 case LTG_TEAMHELP:
372 break;
373 case LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY:
374 BotEntityInfo(bs->teammate, &entinfo);
375 if ( ( (gametype == GT_CTF || gametype == GT_1FCTF) && EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
376 || ( gametype == GT_HARVESTER && EntityCarriesCubes(&entinfo)) ) {
377 teamtask = TEAMTASK_ESCORT;
378 }
379 else {
380 teamtask = TEAMTASK_FOLLOW;
381 }
382 break;
383 case LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA:
384 teamtask = TEAMTASK_DEFENSE;
385 break;
386 case LTG_GETFLAG:
387 teamtask = TEAMTASK_OFFENSE;
388 break;
389 case LTG_RUSHBASE:
390 teamtask = TEAMTASK_DEFENSE;
391 break;
392 case LTG_RETURNFLAG:
393 teamtask = TEAMTASK_RETRIEVE;
394 break;
395 case LTG_CAMP:
396 case LTG_CAMPORDER:
397 teamtask = TEAMTASK_CAMP;
398 break;
399 case LTG_PATROL:
400 teamtask = TEAMTASK_PATROL;
401 break;
402 case LTG_GETITEM:
403 teamtask = TEAMTASK_PATROL;
404 break;
405 case LTG_KILL:
406 teamtask = TEAMTASK_PATROL;
407 break;
408 case LTG_HARVEST:
409 teamtask = TEAMTASK_OFFENSE;
410 break;
411 case LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE:
412 teamtask = TEAMTASK_OFFENSE;
413 break;
414 default:
415 teamtask = TEAMTASK_PATROL;
416 break;
417 }
418 BotSetUserInfo(bs, "teamtask", va("%d", teamtask));
419#endif
420}
421
422/*
423==================
424BotSetLastOrderedTask
425==================
426*/
427int BotSetLastOrderedTask(bot_state_t *bs) {
428
429 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
430 // don't go back to returning the flag if it's at the base
431 if ( bs->lastgoal_ltgtype == LTG_RETURNFLAG ) {
432 if ( BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED ) {
433 if ( bs->redflagstatus == 0 ) {
434 bs->lastgoal_ltgtype = 0;
435 }
436 }
437 else {
438 if ( bs->blueflagstatus == 0 ) {
439 bs->lastgoal_ltgtype = 0;
440 }
441 }
442 }
443 }
444
445 if ( bs->lastgoal_ltgtype ) {
446 bs->decisionmaker = bs->lastgoal_decisionmaker;
447 bs->ordered = qtrue;
448 bs->ltgtype = bs->lastgoal_ltgtype;
449 memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &bs->lastgoal_teamgoal, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
450 bs->teammate = bs->lastgoal_teammate;
451 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + 300;
452 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
453 //
454 if ( gametype == GT_CTF ) {
455 if ( bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG ) {
456 bot_goal_t *tb, *eb;
457 int tt, et;
458
459 tb = BotTeamFlag(bs);
460 eb = BotEnemyFlag(bs);
461 tt = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, tb->areanum, TFL_DEFAULT);
462 et = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, eb->areanum, TFL_DEFAULT);
463 // if the travel time towards the enemy base is larger than towards our base
464 if (et > tt) {
465 //get an alternative route goal towards the enemy base
466 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
467 }
468 }
469 }
470 return qtrue;
471 }
472 return qfalse;
473}
474
475/*
476==================
477BotRefuseOrder
478==================
479*/
480void BotRefuseOrder(bot_state_t *bs) {
481 if (!bs->ordered)
482 return;
483 // if the bot was ordered to do something
484 if ( bs->order_time && bs->order_time > FloatTime() - 10 ) {
485 trap_EA_Action(bs->client, ACTION_NEGATIVE);
486 BotVoiceChat(bs, bs->decisionmaker, VOICECHAT_NO);
487 bs->order_time = 0;
488 }
489}
490
491/*
492==================
493BotCTFSeekGoals
494==================
495*/
496void BotCTFSeekGoals(bot_state_t *bs) {
497 float rnd, l1, l2;
498 int flagstatus, c;
499 vec3_t dir;
500 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
501
502 //when carrying a flag in ctf the bot should rush to the base
503 if (BotCTFCarryingFlag(bs)) {
504 //if not already rushing to the base
505 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_RUSHBASE) {
506 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
507 bs->ltgtype = LTG_RUSHBASE;
508 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_RUSHBASE_TIME;
509 bs->rushbaseaway_time = 0;
510 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
511 bs->ordered = qfalse;
512 //
513 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
514 case TEAM_RED: VectorSubtract(bs->origin, ctf_blueflag.origin, dir); break;
515 case TEAM_BLUE: VectorSubtract(bs->origin, ctf_redflag.origin, dir); break;
516 default: VectorSet(dir, 999, 999, 999); break;
517 }
518 // if the bot picked up the flag very close to the enemy base
519 if ( VectorLength(dir) < 128 ) {
520 // get an alternative route goal through the enemy base
521 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
522 } else {
523 // don't use any alt route goal, just get the hell out of the base
524 bs->altroutegoal.areanum = 0;
525 }
526 BotSetUserInfo(bs, "teamtask", va("%d", TEAMTASK_OFFENSE));
527 BotVoiceChat(bs, -1, VOICECHAT_IHAVEFLAG);
528 }
529 else if (bs->rushbaseaway_time > FloatTime()) {
530 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) flagstatus = bs->redflagstatus;
531 else flagstatus = bs->blueflagstatus;
532 //if the flag is back
533 if (flagstatus == 0) {
534 bs->rushbaseaway_time = 0;
535 }
536 }
537 return;
538 }
539 // if the bot decided to follow someone
540 if ( bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY && !bs->ordered ) {
541 // if the team mate being accompanied no longer carries the flag
542 BotEntityInfo(bs->teammate, &entinfo);
543 if (!EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo)) {
544 bs->ltgtype = 0;
545 }
546 }
547 //
548 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) flagstatus = bs->redflagstatus * 2 + bs->blueflagstatus;
549 else flagstatus = bs->blueflagstatus * 2 + bs->redflagstatus;
550 //if our team has the enemy flag and our flag is at the base
551 if (flagstatus == 1) {
552 //
553 if (bs->owndecision_time < FloatTime()) {
554 //if Not defending the base already
555 if (!(bs->ltgtype == LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA &&
556 (bs->teamgoal.number == ctf_redflag.number ||
557 bs->teamgoal.number == ctf_blueflag.number))) {
558 //if there is a visible team mate flag carrier
559 c = BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
560 if (c >= 0 &&
561 // and not already following the team mate flag carrier
562 (bs->ltgtype != LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY || bs->teammate != c)) {
563 //
564 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
565 //follow the flag carrier
566 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
567 bs->ordered = qfalse;
568 //the team mate
569 bs->teammate = c;
570 //last time the team mate was visible
571 bs->teammatevisible_time = FloatTime();
572 //no message
573 bs->teammessage_time = 0;
574 //no arrive message
575 bs->arrive_time = 1;
576 //
577 BotVoiceChat(bs, bs->teammate, VOICECHAT_ONFOLLOW);
578 //get the team goal time
579 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_ACCOMPANY_TIME;
580 bs->ltgtype = LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY;
581 bs->formation_dist = 3.5 * 32; //3.5 meter
582 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
583 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
584 }
585 }
586 }
587 return;
588 }
589 //if the enemy has our flag
590 else if (flagstatus == 2) {
591 //
592 if (bs->owndecision_time < FloatTime()) {
593 //if enemy flag carrier is visible
594 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
595 if (c >= 0) {
596 //FIXME: fight enemy flag carrier
597 }
598 //if not already doing something important
599 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_GETFLAG &&
600 bs->ltgtype != LTG_RETURNFLAG &&
601 bs->ltgtype != LTG_TEAMHELP &&
602 bs->ltgtype != LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY &&
603 bs->ltgtype != LTG_CAMPORDER &&
604 bs->ltgtype != LTG_PATROL &&
605 bs->ltgtype != LTG_GETITEM) {
606
607 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
608 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
609 bs->ordered = qfalse;
610 //
611 if (random() < 0.5) {
612 //go for the enemy flag
613 bs->ltgtype = LTG_GETFLAG;
614 }
615 else {
616 bs->ltgtype = LTG_RETURNFLAG;
617 }
618 //no team message
619 bs->teammessage_time = 0;
620 //set the time the bot will stop getting the flag
621 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_GETFLAG_TIME;
622 //get an alternative route goal towards the enemy base
623 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
624 //
625 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
626 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
627 }
628 }
629 return;
630 }
631 //if both flags Not at their bases
632 else if (flagstatus == 3) {
633 //
634 if (bs->owndecision_time < FloatTime()) {
635 // if not trying to return the flag and not following the team flag carrier
636 if ( bs->ltgtype != LTG_RETURNFLAG && bs->ltgtype != LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ) {
637 //
638 c = BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
639 // if there is a visible team mate flag carrier
640 if (c >= 0) {
641 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
642 //follow the flag carrier
643 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
644 bs->ordered = qfalse;
645 //the team mate
646 bs->teammate = c;
647 //last time the team mate was visible
648 bs->teammatevisible_time = FloatTime();
649 //no message
650 bs->teammessage_time = 0;
651 //no arrive message
652 bs->arrive_time = 1;
653 //
654 BotVoiceChat(bs, bs->teammate, VOICECHAT_ONFOLLOW);
655 //get the team goal time
656 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_ACCOMPANY_TIME;
657 bs->ltgtype = LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY;
658 bs->formation_dist = 3.5 * 32; //3.5 meter
659 //
660 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
661 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
662 }
663 else {
664 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
665 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
666 bs->ordered = qfalse;
667 //get the enemy flag
668 bs->teammessage_time = FloatTime() + 2 * random();
669 //get the flag
670 bs->ltgtype = LTG_RETURNFLAG;
671 //set the time the bot will stop getting the flag
672 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_RETURNFLAG_TIME;
673 //get an alternative route goal towards the enemy base
674 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
675 //
676 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
677 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
678 }
679 }
680 }
681 return;
682 }
683 // don't just do something wait for the bot team leader to give orders
684 if (BotTeamLeader(bs)) {
685 return;
686 }
687 // if the bot is ordered to do something
688 if ( bs->lastgoal_ltgtype ) {
689 bs->teamgoal_time += 60;
690 }
691 // if the bot decided to do something on its own and has a last ordered goal
692 if ( !bs->ordered && bs->lastgoal_ltgtype ) {
693 bs->ltgtype = 0;
694 }
695 //if already a CTF or team goal
696 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMHELP ||
697 bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ||
698 bs->ltgtype == LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA ||
699 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG ||
700 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RUSHBASE ||
701 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RETURNFLAG ||
702 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMPORDER ||
703 bs->ltgtype == LTG_PATROL ||
704 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETITEM ||
705 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_UNDER ||
706 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_ONTOP) {
707 return;
708 }
709 //
710 if (BotSetLastOrderedTask(bs))
711 return;
712 //
713 if (bs->owndecision_time > FloatTime())
714 return;;
715 //if the bot is roaming
716 if (bs->ctfroam_time > FloatTime())
717 return;
718 //if the bot has enough aggression to decide what to do
719 if (BotAggression(bs) < 50)
720 return;
721 //set the time to send a message to the team mates
722 bs->teammessage_time = FloatTime() + 2 * random();
723 //
724 if (bs->teamtaskpreference & (TEAMTP_ATTACKER|TEAMTP_DEFENDER)) {
725 if (bs->teamtaskpreference & TEAMTP_ATTACKER) {
726 l1 = 0.7f;
727 }
728 else {
729 l1 = 0.2f;
730 }
731 l2 = 0.9f;
732 }
733 else {
734 l1 = 0.4f;
735 l2 = 0.7f;
736 }
737 //get the flag or defend the base
738 rnd = random();
739 if (rnd < l1 && ctf_redflag.areanum && ctf_blueflag.areanum) {
740 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
741 bs->ordered = qfalse;
742 bs->ltgtype = LTG_GETFLAG;
743 //set the time the bot will stop getting the flag
744 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_GETFLAG_TIME;
745 //get an alternative route goal towards the enemy base
746 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
747 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
748 }
749 else if (rnd < l2 && ctf_redflag.areanum && ctf_blueflag.areanum) {
750 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
751 bs->ordered = qfalse;
752 //
753 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_redflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
754 else memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_blueflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
755 //set the ltg type
756 bs->ltgtype = LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA;
757 //set the time the bot stops defending the base
758 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_DEFENDKEYAREA_TIME;
759 bs->defendaway_time = 0;
760 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
761 }
762 else {
763 bs->ltgtype = 0;
764 //set the time the bot will stop roaming
765 bs->ctfroam_time = FloatTime() + CTF_ROAM_TIME;
766 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
767 }
768 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
769#ifdef DEBUG
770 BotPrintTeamGoal(bs);
771#endif //DEBUG
772}

798Bot1FCTFSeekGoals

800*/
801void Bot1FCTFSeekGoals(bot_state_t *bs) {
802 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
803 float rnd, l1, l2;
804 int c;
805
806 //when carrying a flag in ctf the bot should rush to the base
807 if (Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bs)) {
808 //if not already rushing to the base
809 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_RUSHBASE) {
810 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
811 bs->ltgtype = LTG_RUSHBASE;
812 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_RUSHBASE_TIME;
813 bs->rushbaseaway_time = 0;
814 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
815 bs->ordered = qfalse;
816 //get an alternative route goal towards the enemy base
817 BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bs, BotOppositeTeam(bs));
818 //
819 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
820 BotVoiceChat(bs, -1, VOICECHAT_IHAVEFLAG);
821 }
822 return;
823 }
824 // if the bot decided to follow someone
825 if ( bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY && !bs->ordered ) {
826 // if the team mate being accompanied no longer carries the flag
827 BotEntityInfo(bs->teammate, &entinfo);
828 if (!EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo)) {
829 bs->ltgtype = 0;
830 }
831 }
832 //our team has the flag
833 if (bs->neutralflagstatus == 1) {
834 if (bs->owndecision_time < FloatTime()) {
835 // if not already following someone
836 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY) {
837 //if there is a visible team mate flag carrier
838 c = BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
839 if (c >= 0) {
840 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
841 //follow the flag carrier
842 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
843 bs->ordered = qfalse;
844 //the team mate
845 bs->teammate = c;
846 //last time the team mate was visible
847 bs->teammatevisible_time = FloatTime();
848 //no message
849 bs->teammessage_time = 0;
850 //no arrive message
851 bs->arrive_time = 1;
852 //
853 BotVoiceChat(bs, bs->teammate, VOICECHAT_ONFOLLOW);
854 //get the team goal time
855 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_ACCOMPANY_TIME;
856 bs->ltgtype = LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY;
857 bs->formation_dist = 3.5 * 32; //3.5 meter
858 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
859 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
860 return;
861 }
862 }
863 //if already a CTF or team goal
864 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMHELP ||
865 bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ||
866 bs->ltgtype == LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA ||
867 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG ||
868 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RUSHBASE ||
869 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMPORDER ||
870 bs->ltgtype == LTG_PATROL ||
871 bs->ltgtype == LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE ||
872 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETITEM ||
873 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_UNDER ||
874 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_ONTOP) {
875 return;
876 }
877 //if not already attacking the enemy base
878 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE) {
879 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
880 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
881 bs->ordered = qfalse;
882 //
883 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_blueflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
884 else memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_redflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
885 //set the ltg type
886 bs->ltgtype = LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE;
887 //set the time the bot will stop getting the flag
888 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_ATTACKENEMYBASE_TIME;
889 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
890 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
891 }
892 }
893 return;
894 }
895 //enemy team has the flag
896 else if (bs->neutralflagstatus == 2) {
897 if (bs->owndecision_time < FloatTime()) {
898 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
899 if (c >= 0) {
900 //FIXME: attack enemy flag carrier
901 }
902 //if already a CTF or team goal
903 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMHELP ||
904 bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ||
905 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMPORDER ||
906 bs->ltgtype == LTG_PATROL ||
907 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETITEM) {
908 return;
909 }
910 // if not already defending the base
911 if (bs->ltgtype != LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA) {
912 BotRefuseOrder(bs);
913 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
914 bs->ordered = qfalse;
915 //
916 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_redflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
917 else memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_blueflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
918 //set the ltg type
919 bs->ltgtype = LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA;
920 //set the time the bot stops defending the base
921 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_DEFENDKEYAREA_TIME;
922 bs->defendaway_time = 0;
923 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
924 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
925 }
926 }
927 return;
928 }
929 // don't just do something wait for the bot team leader to give orders
930 if (BotTeamLeader(bs)) {
931 return;
932 }
933 // if the bot is ordered to do something
934 if ( bs->lastgoal_ltgtype ) {
935 bs->teamgoal_time += 60;
936 }
937 // if the bot decided to do something on its own and has a last ordered goal
938 if ( !bs->ordered && bs->lastgoal_ltgtype ) {
939 bs->ltgtype = 0;
940 }
941 //if already a CTF or team goal
942 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMHELP ||
943 bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ||
944 bs->ltgtype == LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA ||
945 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG ||
946 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RUSHBASE ||
947 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RETURNFLAG ||
948 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMPORDER ||
949 bs->ltgtype == LTG_PATROL ||
950 bs->ltgtype == LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE ||
951 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETITEM ||
952 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_UNDER ||
953 bs->ltgtype == LTG_MAKELOVE_ONTOP) {
954 return;
955 }
956 //
957 if (BotSetLastOrderedTask(bs))
958 return;
959 //
960 if (bs->owndecision_time > FloatTime())
961 return;;
962 //if the bot is roaming
963 if (bs->ctfroam_time > FloatTime())
964 return;
965 //if the bot has enough aggression to decide what to do
966 if (BotAggression(bs) < 50)
967 return;
968 //set the time to send a message to the team mates
969 bs->teammessage_time = FloatTime() + 2 * random();
970 //
971 if (bs->teamtaskpreference & (TEAMTP_ATTACKER|TEAMTP_DEFENDER)) {
972 if (bs->teamtaskpreference & TEAMTP_ATTACKER) {
973 l1 = 0.7f;
974 }
975 else {
976 l1 = 0.2f;
977 }
978 l2 = 0.9f;
979 }
980 else {
981 l1 = 0.4f;
982 l2 = 0.7f;
983 }
984 //get the flag or defend the base
985 rnd = random();
986 if (rnd < l1 && ctf_neutralflag.areanum) {
987 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
988 bs->ordered = qfalse;
989 bs->ltgtype = LTG_GETFLAG;
990 //set the time the bot will stop getting the flag
991 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + CTF_GETFLAG_TIME;
992 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
993 }
994 else if (rnd < l2 && ctf_redflag.areanum && ctf_blueflag.areanum) {
995 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
996 bs->ordered = qfalse;
997 //
998 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_redflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
999 else memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, &ctf_blueflag, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
1000 //set the ltg type
1001 bs->ltgtype = LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA;
1002 //set the time the bot stops defending the base
1003 bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + TEAM_DEFENDKEYAREA_TIME;
1004 bs->defendaway_time = 0;
1005 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
1006 }
1007 else {
1008 bs->ltgtype = 0;
1009 //set the time the bot will stop roaming
1010 bs->ctfroam_time = FloatTime() + CTF_ROAM_TIME;
1011 BotSetTeamStatus(bs);
1012 }
1013 bs->owndecision_time = FloatTime() + 5;
1014#ifdef DEBUG
1015 BotPrintTeamGoal(bs);
1016#endif //DEBUG
1017}

1190 return;

1324/*
1325==================
1326BotTeamGoals
1327==================
1328*/
1329void BotTeamGoals(bot_state_t *bs, int retreat) {
1330
1331 if ( retreat ) {
1332 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
1333 BotCTFRetreatGoals(bs);
1334 }
1335#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1336 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
1337 Bot1FCTFRetreatGoals(bs);
1338 }
1339 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
1340 BotObeliskRetreatGoals(bs);
1341 }
1342 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
1343 BotHarvesterRetreatGoals(bs);
1344 }
1345#endif
1346 }
1347 else {
1348 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
1349 //decide what to do in CTF mode
1350 BotCTFSeekGoals(bs);
1351 }
1352#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1353 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
1354 Bot1FCTFSeekGoals(bs);
1355 }
1356 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
1357 BotObeliskSeekGoals(bs);
1358 }
1359 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
1360 BotHarvesterSeekGoals(bs);
1361 }
1362#endif
1363 }
1364 // reset the order time which is used to see if
1365 // we decided to refuse an order
1366 bs->order_time = 0;
1367}
1368
1369/*
1370==================
1371BotPointAreaNum
1372==================
1373*/
1374int BotPointAreaNum(vec3_t origin) {
1375 int areanum, numareas, areas[10];
1376 vec3_t end;
1377
1378 areanum = trap_AAS_PointAreaNum(origin);
1379 if (areanum) return areanum;
1380 VectorCopy(origin, end);
1381 end[2] += 10;
1382 numareas = trap_AAS_TraceAreas(origin, end, areas, NULL, 10);
1383 if (numareas > 0) return areas[0];
1384 return 0;
1385}

1387/*
1388==================
1389ClientName
1390==================
1391*/
1392char *ClientName(int client, char *name, int size) {
1393 char buf[MAX_INFO_STRING];
1394
1395 if (client < 0 || client >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
1396 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "ClientName: client out of range\n");
1397 return "[client out of range]";
1398 }
1399 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_PLAYERS+client, buf, sizeof(buf));
1400 strncpy(name, Info_ValueForKey(buf, "n"), size-1);
1401 name[size-1] = '\0';
1402 Q_CleanStr( name );
1403 return name;
1404}
1405
1406/*
1407==================
1408ClientSkin
1409==================
1410*/
1411char *ClientSkin(int client, char *skin, int size) {
1412 char buf[MAX_INFO_STRING];
1413
1414 if (client < 0 || client >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
1415 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "ClientSkin: client out of range\n");
1416 return "[client out of range]";
1417 }
1418 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_PLAYERS+client, buf, sizeof(buf));
1419 strncpy(skin, Info_ValueForKey(buf, "model"), size-1);
1420 skin[size-1] = '\0';
1421 return skin;
1422}

1424/*
1425==================
1426ClientFromName
1427==================
1428*/
1429int ClientFromName(char *name) {
1430 int i;
1431 char buf[MAX_INFO_STRING];
1432
1433 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
1434 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_PLAYERS+i, buf, sizeof(buf));
1435 Q_CleanStr( buf );
1436 if (!Q_stricmp(Info_ValueForKey(buf, "n"), name)) return i;
1437 }
1438 return -1;
1439}
1440
1441/*
1442==================
1443ClientOnSameTeamFromName
1444==================
1445*/
1446int ClientOnSameTeamFromName(bot_state_t *bs, char *name) {
1447 int i;
1448 char buf[MAX_INFO_STRING];
1449
1450 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
1451 if (!BotSameTeam(bs, i))
1452 continue;
1453 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_PLAYERS+i, buf, sizeof(buf));
1454 Q_CleanStr( buf );
1455 if (!Q_stricmp(Info_ValueForKey(buf, "n"), name)) return i;
1456 }
1457 return -1;
1458}
1459
1460/*
1461==================
1462stristr
1463==================
1464*/
1465char *stristr(char *str, char *charset) {
1466 int i;
1467
1468 while(*str) {
1469 for (i = 0; charset[i] && str[i]; i++) {
1470 if (toupper(charset[i]) != toupper(str[i])) break;
1471 }
1472 if (!charset[i]) return str;
1473 str++;
1474 }
1475 return NULL;
1476}
1477
1478/*
1479==================
1480EasyClientName
1481==================
1482*/
1483char *EasyClientName(int client, char *buf, int size) {
1484 int i;
1485 char *str1, *str2, *ptr, c;
1486 char name[128] = {0};
1487
1488 ClientName(client, name, sizeof(name));
1489
1490 for (i = 0; name[i]; i++) name[i] &= 127;
1491 //remove all spaces
1492 for (ptr = strstr(name, " "); ptr; ptr = strstr(name, " ")) {
1493 memmove(ptr, ptr+1, strlen(ptr+1)+1);
1494 }
1495 //check for [x] and ]x[ clan names
1496 str1 = strstr(name, "[");
1497 str2 = strstr(name, "]");
1498 if (str1 && str2) {
1499 if (str2 > str1) memmove(str1, str2+1, strlen(str2+1)+1);
1500 else memmove(str2, str1+1, strlen(str1+1)+1);
1501 }
1502 //remove Mr prefix
1503 if ((name[0] == 'm' || name[0] == 'M') &&
1504 (name[1] == 'r' || name[1] == 'R')) {
1505 memmove(name, name+2, strlen(name+2)+1);
1506 }
1507 //only allow lower case alphabet characters
1508 ptr = name;
1509 while(*ptr) {
1510 c = *ptr;
1511 if ((c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') ||
1512 (c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '_') {
1513 ptr++;
1514 }
1515 else if (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') {
1516 *ptr += 'a' - 'A';
1517 ptr++;
1518 }
1519 else {
1520 memmove(ptr, ptr+1, strlen(ptr + 1)+1);
1521 }
1522 }
1523 strncpy(buf, name, size-1);
1524 buf[size-1] = '\0';
1525 return buf;
1526}

1528/*
1529==================
1530BotSynonymContext
1531==================
1532*/
1533int BotSynonymContext(bot_state_t *bs) {
1534 int context;
1535
1536 context = CONTEXT_NORMAL|CONTEXT_NEARBYITEM|CONTEXT_NAMES;
1537 //
1538 if (gametype == GT_CTF
1539#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1540 || gametype == GT_1FCTF
1541#endif
1542 ) {
1543 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) context |= CONTEXT_CTFREDTEAM;
1544 else context |= CONTEXT_CTFBLUETEAM;
1545 }
1546#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1547 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
1548 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) context |= CONTEXT_OBELISKREDTEAM;
1549 else context |= CONTEXT_OBELISKBLUETEAM;
1550 }
1551 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
1552 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) context |= CONTEXT_HARVESTERREDTEAM;
1553 else context |= CONTEXT_HARVESTERBLUETEAM;
1554 }
1555#endif
1556 return context;
1557}

1559/*
1560==================
1561BotChooseWeapon
1562==================
1563*/
1564void BotChooseWeapon(bot_state_t *bs) {
1565 int newweaponnum;
1566
1567 if (bs->cur_ps.weaponstate == WEAPON_RAISING ||
1568 bs->cur_ps.weaponstate == WEAPON_DROPPING) {
1569 trap_EA_SelectWeapon(bs->client, bs->weaponnum);
1570 }
1571 else {
1572 newweaponnum = trap_BotChooseBestFightWeapon(bs->ws, bs->inventory);
1573 if (bs->weaponnum != newweaponnum) bs->weaponchange_time = FloatTime();
1574 bs->weaponnum = newweaponnum;
1575 //BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "bs->weaponnum = %d\n", bs->weaponnum);
1576 trap_EA_SelectWeapon(bs->client, bs->weaponnum);
1577 }
1578}

1580/*
1581==================
1582BotSetupForMovement
1583==================
1584*/
1585void BotSetupForMovement(bot_state_t *bs) {
1586 bot_initmove_t initmove;
1587
1588 memset(&initmove, 0, sizeof(bot_initmove_t));
1589 VectorCopy(bs->cur_ps.origin, initmove.origin);
1590 VectorCopy(bs->cur_ps.velocity, initmove.velocity);
1591 VectorClear(initmove.viewoffset);
1592 initmove.viewoffset[2] += bs->cur_ps.viewheight;
1593 initmove.entitynum = bs->entitynum;
1594 initmove.client = bs->client;
1595 initmove.thinktime = bs->thinktime;
1596 //set the onground flag
1597 if (bs->cur_ps.groundEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE) initmove.or_moveflags |= MFL_ONGROUND;
1598 //set the teleported flag
1599 if ((bs->cur_ps.pm_flags & PMF_TIME_KNOCKBACK) && (bs->cur_ps.pm_time > 0)) {
1600 initmove.or_moveflags |= MFL_TELEPORTED;
1601 }
1602 //set the waterjump flag
1603 if ((bs->cur_ps.pm_flags & PMF_TIME_WATERJUMP) && (bs->cur_ps.pm_time > 0)) {
1604 initmove.or_moveflags |= MFL_WATERJUMP;
1605 }
1606 //set presence type
1607 if (bs->cur_ps.pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED) initmove.presencetype = PRESENCE_CROUCH;
1608 else initmove.presencetype = PRESENCE_NORMAL;
1609 //
1610 if (bs->walker > 0.5) initmove.or_moveflags |= MFL_WALK;
1611 //
1612 VectorCopy(bs->viewangles, initmove.viewangles);
1613 //
1614 trap_BotInitMoveState(bs->ms, &initmove);
1615}

1617/*
1618==================
1619BotCheckItemPickup
1620==================
1621*/
1622void BotCheckItemPickup(bot_state_t *bs, int *oldinventory) {
1623#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1624 int offence, leader;
1625
1626 if (gametype <= GT_TEAM)
1627 return;
1628
1629 offence = -1;
1630 // go into offence if picked up the kamikaze or invulnerability
1631 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_KAMIKAZE] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_KAMIKAZE] >= 1) {
1632 offence = qtrue;
1633 }
1634 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_INVULNERABILITY] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_INVULNERABILITY] >= 1) {
1635 offence = qtrue;
1636 }
1637 // if not already wearing the kamikaze or invulnerability
1638 if (!bs->inventory[INVENTORY_KAMIKAZE] && !bs->inventory[INVENTORY_INVULNERABILITY]) {
1639 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_SCOUT] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SCOUT] >= 1) {
1640 offence = qtrue;
1641 }
1642 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_GUARD] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GUARD] >= 1) {
1643 offence = qtrue;
1644 }
1645 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_DOUBLER] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_DOUBLER] >= 1) {
1646 offence = qfalse;
1647 }
1648 if (!oldinventory[INVENTORY_AMMOREGEN] && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_AMMOREGEN] >= 1) {
1649 offence = qfalse;
1650 }
1651 }
1652
1653 if (offence >= 0) {
1654 leader = ClientFromName(bs->teamleader);
1655 if (offence) {
1656 if (!(bs->teamtaskpreference & TEAMTP_ATTACKER)) {
1657 // if we have a bot team leader
1658 if (BotTeamLeader(bs)) {
1659 // tell the leader we want to be on offence
1660 BotVoiceChat(bs, leader, VOICECHAT_WANTONOFFENSE);
1661 //BotAI_BotInitialChat(bs, "wantoffence", NULL);
1662 //trap_BotEnterChat(bs->cs, leader, CHAT_TELL);
1663 }
1664 else if (g_spSkill.integer <= 3) {
1665 if ( bs->ltgtype != LTG_GETFLAG &&
1666 bs->ltgtype != LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE &&
1667 bs->ltgtype != LTG_HARVEST ) {
1668 //
1669 if ((gametype != GT_CTF || (bs->redflagstatus == 0 && bs->blueflagstatus == 0)) &&
1670 (gametype != GT_1FCTF || bs->neutralflagstatus == 0) ) {
1671 // tell the leader we want to be on offence
1672 BotVoiceChat(bs, leader, VOICECHAT_WANTONOFFENSE);
1673 //BotAI_BotInitialChat(bs, "wantoffence", NULL);
1674 //trap_BotEnterChat(bs->cs, leader, CHAT_TELL);
1675 }
1676 }
1677 }
1678 bs->teamtaskpreference |= TEAMTP_ATTACKER;
1679 }
1680 bs->teamtaskpreference &= ~TEAMTP_DEFENDER;
1681 }
1682 else {
1683 if (!(bs->teamtaskpreference & TEAMTP_DEFENDER)) {
1684 // if we have a bot team leader
1685 if (BotTeamLeader(bs)) {
1686 // tell the leader we want to be on defense
1687 BotVoiceChat(bs, -1, VOICECHAT_WANTONDEFENSE);
1688 //BotAI_BotInitialChat(bs, "wantdefence", NULL);
1689 //trap_BotEnterChat(bs->cs, leader, CHAT_TELL);
1690 }
1691 else if (g_spSkill.integer <= 3) {
1692 if ( bs->ltgtype != LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA ) {
1693 //
1694 if ((gametype != GT_CTF || (bs->redflagstatus == 0 && bs->blueflagstatus == 0)) &&
1695 (gametype != GT_1FCTF || bs->neutralflagstatus == 0) ) {
1696 // tell the leader we want to be on defense
1697 BotVoiceChat(bs, -1, VOICECHAT_WANTONDEFENSE);
1698 //BotAI_BotInitialChat(bs, "wantdefence", NULL);
1699 //trap_BotEnterChat(bs->cs, leader, CHAT_TELL);
1700 }
1701 }
1702 }
1703 bs->teamtaskpreference |= TEAMTP_DEFENDER;
1704 }
1705 bs->teamtaskpreference &= ~TEAMTP_ATTACKER;
1706 }
1707 }
1708#endif
1709}

1711/*
1712==================
1713BotUpdateInventory
1714==================
1715*/
1716void BotUpdateInventory(bot_state_t *bs) {
1717 int oldinventory[MAX_ITEMS];
1718
1719 memcpy(oldinventory, bs->inventory, sizeof(oldinventory));

1722 //weapons

1724 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SHOTGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_SHOTGUN)) != 0;
1725 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_MACHINEGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_MACHINEGUN)) != 0;
1726 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GRENADELAUNCHER] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER)) != 0;
1727 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETLAUNCHER] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_ROCKET_LAUNCHER)) != 0;
1728 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_LIGHTNING] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_LIGHTNING)) != 0;
1729 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_RAILGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_RAILGUN)) != 0;
1730 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_PLASMAGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_PLASMAGUN)) != 0;
1731 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFG10K] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_BFG)) != 0;
1732 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GRAPPLINGHOOK] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_GRAPPLING_HOOK)) != 0;
1733#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1734 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_NAILGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_NAILGUN)) != 0;;
1735 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_PROXLAUNCHER] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_PROX_LAUNCHER)) != 0;;
1736 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_CHAINGUN] = (bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_WEAPONS] & (1 << WP_CHAINGUN)) != 0;;
1737#endif
1738 //ammo
1739 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SHELLS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_SHOTGUN];
1740 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BULLETS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_MACHINEGUN];
1741 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GRENADES] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER];
1742 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_CELLS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_PLASMAGUN];
1743 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_LIGHTNINGAMMO] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_LIGHTNING];
1744 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_ROCKET_LAUNCHER];
1745 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SLUGS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_RAILGUN];
1746 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFGAMMO] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_BFG];
1747#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1748 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_NAILS] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_NAILGUN];
1749 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_MINES] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_PROX_LAUNCHER];
1750 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BELT] = bs->cur_ps.ammo[WP_CHAINGUN];
1751#endif
1752 //powerups
1753 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HEALTH];
1754 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_TELEPORTER] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HOLDABLE_ITEM] == MODELINDEX_TELEPORTER;
1755 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_MEDKIT] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HOLDABLE_ITEM] == MODELINDEX_MEDKIT;
1756#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1757 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_KAMIKAZE] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HOLDABLE_ITEM] == MODELINDEX_KAMIKAZE;
1758 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_PORTAL] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HOLDABLE_ITEM] == MODELINDEX_PORTAL;
1759 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_INVULNERABILITY] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_HOLDABLE_ITEM] == MODELINDEX_INVULNERABILITY;
1760#endif
1761 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_QUAD] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_QUAD] != 0;
1762 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ENVIRONMENTSUIT] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_BATTLESUIT] != 0;
1763 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HASTE] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_HASTE] != 0;
1764 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_INVISIBILITY] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_INVIS] != 0;
1765 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_REGEN] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_REGEN] != 0;
1766 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_FLIGHT] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_FLIGHT] != 0;
1767#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1768 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SCOUT] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_PERSISTANT_POWERUP] == MODELINDEX_SCOUT;
1769 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GUARD] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_PERSISTANT_POWERUP] == MODELINDEX_GUARD;
1770 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_DOUBLER] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_PERSISTANT_POWERUP] == MODELINDEX_DOUBLER;
1771 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_AMMOREGEN] = bs->cur_ps.stats[STAT_PERSISTANT_POWERUP] == MODELINDEX_AMMOREGEN;
1772#endif
1773 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_REDFLAG] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_REDFLAG] != 0;
1774 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BLUEFLAG] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_BLUEFLAG] != 0;
1775#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1776 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_NEUTRALFLAG] = bs->cur_ps.powerups[PW_NEUTRALFLAG] != 0;
1777 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED) {
1778 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_REDCUBE] = bs->cur_ps.generic1;
1779 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BLUECUBE] = 0;
1780 }
1781 else {
1782 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_REDCUBE] = 0;
1783 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BLUECUBE] = bs->cur_ps.generic1;
1784 }
1785#endif
1786 BotCheckItemPickup(bs, oldinventory);
1787}

1800 bs->inventory[ENEMY_HEIGHT] = (int) dir[2];

1806#ifdef MISSIONPACK
1807/*
1808==================
1809BotUseKamikaze
1810==================
1811*/
1812#define KAMIKAZE_DIST 1024
1813
1814void BotUseKamikaze(bot_state_t *bs) {
1815 int c, teammates, enemies;
1816 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
1817 vec3_t dir, target;
1818 bot_goal_t *goal;
1819 bsp_trace_t trace;
1820
1821 //if the bot has no kamikaze
1822 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_KAMIKAZE] <= 0)
1823 return;
1824 if (bs->kamikaze_time > FloatTime())
1825 return;
1826 bs->kamikaze_time = FloatTime() + 0.2;
1827 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
1828 //never use kamikaze if the team flag carrier is visible
1829 if (BotCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
1830 return;
1831 c = BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1832 if (c >= 0) {
1833 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1834 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1835 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST))
1836 return;
1837 }
1838 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1839 if (c >= 0) {
1840 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1841 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1842 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST)) {
1843 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1844 return;
1845 }
1846 }
1847 }
1848 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
1849 //never use kamikaze if the team flag carrier is visible
1850 if (Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
1851 return;
1852 c = BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1853 if (c >= 0) {
1854 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1855 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1856 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST))
1857 return;
1858 }
1859 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1860 if (c >= 0) {
1861 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1862 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1863 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST)) {
1864 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1865 return;
1866 }
1867 }
1868 }
1869 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
1870 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
1871 case TEAM_RED: goal = &blueobelisk; break;
1872 default: goal = &redobelisk; break;
1873 }
1874 //if the obelisk is visible
1875 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
1876 target[2] += 1;
1877 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, target, dir);
1878 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST * 0.9)) {
1879 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
1880 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
1881 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1882 return;
1883 }
1884 }
1885 }
1886 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
1887 //
1888 if (BotHarvesterCarryingCubes(bs))
1889 return;
1890 //never use kamikaze if a team mate carrying cubes is visible
1891 c = BotTeamCubeCarrierVisible(bs);
1892 if (c >= 0) {
1893 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1894 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1895 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST))
1896 return;
1897 }
1898 c = BotEnemyCubeCarrierVisible(bs);
1899 if (c >= 0) {
1900 BotEntityInfo(c, &entinfo);
1901 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
1902 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(KAMIKAZE_DIST)) {
1903 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1904 return;
1905 }
1906 }
1907 }
1908 //
1909 BotVisibleTeamMatesAndEnemies(bs, &teammates, &enemies, KAMIKAZE_DIST);
1910 //
1911 if (enemies > 2 && enemies > teammates+1) {
1912 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1913 return;
1914 }
1915}

1917/*
1918==================
1919BotUseInvulnerability
1920==================
1921*/
1922void BotUseInvulnerability(bot_state_t *bs) {
1923 int c;
1924 vec3_t dir, target;
1925 bot_goal_t *goal;
1926 bsp_trace_t trace;
1927
1928 //if the bot has no invulnerability
1929 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_INVULNERABILITY] <= 0)
1930 return;
1931 if (bs->invulnerability_time > FloatTime())
1932 return;
1933 bs->invulnerability_time = FloatTime() + 0.2;
1934 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
1935 //never use kamikaze if the team flag carrier is visible
1936 if (BotCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
1937 return;
1938 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1939 if (c >= 0)
1940 return;
1941 //if near enemy flag and the flag is visible
1942 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
1943 case TEAM_RED: goal = &ctf_blueflag; break;
1944 default: goal = &ctf_redflag; break;
1945 }
1946 //if the obelisk is visible
1947 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
1948 target[2] += 1;
1949 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, target, dir);
1950 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(200)) {
1951 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
1952 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
1953 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1954 return;
1955 }
1956 }
1957 }
1958 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
1959 //never use kamikaze if the team flag carrier is visible
1960 if (Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
1961 return;
1962 c = BotEnemyFlagCarrierVisible(bs);
1963 if (c >= 0)
1964 return;
1965 //if near enemy flag and the flag is visible
1966 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
1967 case TEAM_RED: goal = &ctf_blueflag; break;
1968 default: goal = &ctf_redflag; break;
1969 }
1970 //if the obelisk is visible
1971 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
1972 target[2] += 1;
1973 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, target, dir);
1974 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(200)) {
1975 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
1976 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
1977 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1978 return;
1979 }
1980 }
1981 }
1982 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
1983 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
1984 case TEAM_RED: goal = &blueobelisk; break;
1985 default: goal = &redobelisk; break;
1986 }
1987 //if the obelisk is visible
1988 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
1989 target[2] += 1;
1990 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, target, dir);
1991 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(300)) {
1992 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
1993 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
1994 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
1995 return;
1996 }
1997 }
1998 }
1999 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
2000 //
2001 if (BotHarvesterCarryingCubes(bs))
2002 return;
2003 c = BotEnemyCubeCarrierVisible(bs);
2004 if (c >= 0)
2005 return;
2006 //if near enemy base and enemy base is visible
2007 switch(BotTeam(bs)) {
2008 case TEAM_RED: goal = &blueobelisk; break;
2009 default: goal = &redobelisk; break;
2010 }
2011 //if the obelisk is visible
2012 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
2013 target[2] += 1;
2014 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, target, dir);
2015 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(200)) {
2016 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
2017 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
2018 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
2019 return;
2020 }
2021 }
2022 }
2023}
2024#endif

2032 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 40) {

2035#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2036 && !Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bs)
2037 && !BotHarvesterCarryingCubes(bs)
2038#endif
2039 ) {
2040 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
2041 }
2042 }
2043 }
2044 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 60) {
2045 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_MEDKIT] > 0) {
2046 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
2047 }
2048 }
2049#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2050 BotUseKamikaze(bs);
2051 BotUseInvulnerability(bs);
2052#endif
2053}

2113/*
2114==================
2115BotCreateWayPoint
2116==================
2117*/
2118bot_waypoint_t *BotCreateWayPoint(char *name, vec3_t origin, int areanum) {
2119 bot_waypoint_t *wp;
2120 vec3_t waypointmins = {-8, -8, -8}, waypointmaxs = {8, 8, 8};
2121
2122 wp = botai_freewaypoints;
2123 if ( !wp ) {
2124 BotAI_Print( PRT_WARNING, "BotCreateWayPoint: Out of waypoints\n" );
2125 return NULL;
2126 }
2127 botai_freewaypoints = botai_freewaypoints->next;
2128
2129 Q_strncpyz( wp->name, name, sizeof(wp->name) );
2130 VectorCopy(origin, wp->goal.origin);
2131 VectorCopy(waypointmins, wp->goal.mins);
2132 VectorCopy(waypointmaxs, wp->goal.maxs);
2133 wp->goal.areanum = areanum;
2134 wp->next = NULL;
2135 wp->prev = NULL;
2136 return wp;
2137}

2139/*
2140==================
2141BotFindWayPoint
2142==================
2143*/
2144bot_waypoint_t *BotFindWayPoint(bot_waypoint_t *waypoints, char *name) {
2145 bot_waypoint_t *wp;
2146
2147 for (wp = waypoints; wp; wp = wp->next) {
2148 if (!Q_stricmp(wp->name, name)) return wp;
2149 }
2150 return NULL;
2151}

2153/*
2154==================
2155BotFreeWaypoints
2156==================
2157*/
2158void BotFreeWaypoints(bot_waypoint_t *wp) {
2159 bot_waypoint_t *nextwp;
2160
2161 for (; wp; wp = nextwp) {
2162 nextwp = wp->next;
2163 wp->next = botai_freewaypoints;
2164 botai_freewaypoints = wp;
2165 }
2166}

2169==================
2170BotInitWaypoints
2171==================
2172*/
2173void BotInitWaypoints(void) {
2174 int i;
2175
2176 botai_freewaypoints = NULL;
2177 for (i = 0; i < MAX_WAYPOINTS; i++) {
2178 botai_waypoints[i].next = botai_freewaypoints;
2179 botai_freewaypoints = &botai_waypoints[i];
2180 }
2181}

2192/*
2193==================
2194BotAggression
2195==================
2196*/
2197float BotAggression(bot_state_t *bs) {
2198 //if the bot has quad
2199 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_QUAD]) {
2200 //if the bot is not holding the gauntlet or the enemy is really nearby
2201 if (bs->weaponnum != WP_GAUNTLET ||
2202 bs->inventory[ENEMY_HORIZONTAL_DIST] < 80) {
2203 return 70;
2204 }
2205 }
2206 //if the enemy is located way higher than the bot
2207 if (bs->inventory[ENEMY_HEIGHT] > 200) return 0;
2208 //if the bot is very low on health
2209 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 60) return 0;
2210 //if the bot is low on health
2211 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 80) {
2212 //if the bot has insufficient armor
2213 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ARMOR] < 40) return 0;
2214 }
2215 //if the bot can use the bfg
2216 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFG10K] > 0 &&
2217 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFGAMMO] > 7) return 100;
2218 //if the bot can use the railgun
2219 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_RAILGUN] > 0 &&
2220 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SLUGS] > 5) return 95;
2221 //if the bot can use the lightning gun
2222 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_LIGHTNING] > 0 &&
2223 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_LIGHTNINGAMMO] > 50) return 90;
2224 //if the bot can use the rocketlauncher
2225 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETLAUNCHER] > 0 &&
2226 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETS] > 5) return 90;
2227 //if the bot can use the plasmagun
2228 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_PLASMAGUN] > 0 &&
2229 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_CELLS] > 40) return 85;
2230 //if the bot can use the grenade launcher
2231 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GRENADELAUNCHER] > 0 &&
2232 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_GRENADES] > 10) return 80;
2233 //if the bot can use the shotgun
2234 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SHOTGUN] > 0 &&
2235 bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SHELLS] > 10) return 50;
2236 //otherwise the bot is not feeling too good
2237 return 0;
2238}

2246 if (bs->weaponnum == WP_GAUNTLET) {

2250 return 100;

2253 return 90;

2255 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 60) {
2256 return 80;
2257 }
2258 return 0;

2261/*
2262==================
2263BotWantsToRetreat
2264==================
2265*/
2266int BotWantsToRetreat(bot_state_t *bs) {
2267 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
2268
2269 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
2270 //always retreat when carrying a CTF flag
2271 if (BotCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
2272 return qtrue;
2273 }
2274#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2275 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
2276 //if carrying the flag then always retreat
2277 if (Bot1FCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
2278 return qtrue;
2279 }
2280 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
2281 //the bots should be dedicated to attacking the enemy obelisk
2282 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE) {
2283 if (bs->enemy != redobelisk.entitynum &&
2284 bs->enemy != blueobelisk.entitynum) {
2285 return qtrue;
2286 }
2287 }
2288 if (BotFeelingBad(bs) > 50) {
2289 return qtrue;
2290 }
2291 return qfalse;
2292 }
2293 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
2294 //if carrying cubes then always retreat
2295 if (BotHarvesterCarryingCubes(bs)) return qtrue;
2296 }
2297#endif
2298 //
2299 if (bs->enemy >= 0) {
2300 BotEntityInfo(bs->enemy, &entinfo);
2301 // if the enemy is carrying a flag
2302 if (EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo)) return qfalse;
2303#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2304 // if the enemy is carrying cubes
2305 if (EntityCarriesCubes(&entinfo)) return qfalse;
2306#endif
2307 }
2308 //if the bot is getting the flag
2309 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG)
2310 return qtrue;
2311 //
2312 if (BotAggression(bs) < 50)
2313 return qtrue;
2314 return qfalse;
2315}

2321*/
2322int BotWantsToChase(bot_state_t *bs) {
2323 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
2324
2325 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
2326 //never chase when carrying a CTF flag
2327 if (BotCTFCarryingFlag(bs))
2328 return qfalse;
2329 //always chase if the enemy is carrying a flag
2330 BotEntityInfo(bs->enemy, &entinfo);
2331 if (EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
2332 return qtrue;

2334#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2335 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {

2338 return qfalse;
2339 //always chase if the enemy is carrying a flag

2341 if (EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
2342 return qtrue;
2343 }
2344 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
2345 //the bots should be dedicated to attacking the enemy obelisk
2346 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_ATTACKENEMYBASE) {
2347 if (bs->enemy != redobelisk.entitynum &&
2348 bs->enemy != blueobelisk.entitynum) {
2349 return qfalse;
2350 }
2351 }
2352 }
2353 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
2354 //never chase if carrying cubes
2355 if (BotHarvesterCarryingCubes(bs)) return qfalse;
2356
2357 BotEntityInfo(bs->enemy, &entinfo);
2358 // always chase if the enemy is carrying cubes
2359 if (EntityCarriesCubes(&entinfo)) return qtrue;
2360 }
2361#endif
2362 //if the bot is getting the flag
2363 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG)
2364 return qfalse;
2365 //
2366 if (BotAggression(bs) > 50)
2367 return qtrue;
2368 return qfalse;
2369}

2382BotCanAndWantsToRocketJump
2383==================
2384*/
2385int BotCanAndWantsToRocketJump(bot_state_t *bs) {
2386 float rocketjumper;
2387
2388 //if rocket jumping is disabled
2389 if (!bot_rocketjump.integer) return qfalse;
2390 //if no rocket launcher
2391 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETLAUNCHER] <= 0) return qfalse;
2392 //if low on rockets
2393 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETS] < 3) return qfalse;
2394 //never rocket jump with the Quad
2395 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_QUAD]) return qfalse;
2396 //if low on health
2397 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 60) return qfalse;
2398 //if not full health
2399 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH] < 90) {
2400 //if the bot has insufficient armor
2401 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ARMOR] < 40) return qfalse;
2402 }
2403 rocketjumper = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_WEAPONJUMPING, 0, 1);
2404 if (rocketjumper < 0.5) return qfalse;
2405 return qtrue;
2406}

2457/*
2458==================
2459BotGoCamp
2460==================
2461*/
2462void BotGoCamp(bot_state_t *bs, bot_goal_t *goal) {
2463 float camper;
2464
2465 bs->decisionmaker = bs->client;
2466 //set message time to zero so bot will NOT show any message
2467 bs->teammessage_time = 0;
2468 //set the ltg type
2469 bs->ltgtype = LTG_CAMP;
2470 //set the team goal
2471 memcpy(&bs->teamgoal, goal, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
2472 //get the team goal time
2473 camper = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_CAMPER, 0, 1);
2474 if (camper > 0.99) bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + 99999;
2475 else bs->teamgoal_time = FloatTime() + 120 + 180 * camper + random() * 15;
2476 //set the last time the bot started camping
2477 bs->camp_time = FloatTime();
2478 //the teammate that requested the camping
2479 bs->teammate = 0;
2480 //do NOT type arrive message
2481 bs->arrive_time = 1;
2482}
2483
2484/*
2485==================
2486BotWantsToCamp
2487==================
2488*/
2489int BotWantsToCamp(bot_state_t *bs) {
2490 float camper;
2491 int cs, traveltime, besttraveltime;
2492 bot_goal_t goal, bestgoal;
2493
2494 camper = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_CAMPER, 0, 1);
2495 if (camper < 0.1) return qfalse;
2496 //if the bot has a team goal
2497 if (bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMHELP ||
2498 bs->ltgtype == LTG_TEAMACCOMPANY ||
2499 bs->ltgtype == LTG_DEFENDKEYAREA ||
2500 bs->ltgtype == LTG_GETFLAG ||
2501 bs->ltgtype == LTG_RUSHBASE ||
2502 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMP ||
2503 bs->ltgtype == LTG_CAMPORDER ||
2504 bs->ltgtype == LTG_PATROL) {
2505 return qfalse;
2506 }
2507 //if camped recently
2508 if (bs->camp_time > FloatTime() - 60 + 300 * (1-camper)) return qfalse;
2509 //
2510 if (random() > camper) {
2511 bs->camp_time = FloatTime();
2512 return qfalse;
2513 }
2514 //if the bot isn't healthy enough
2515 if (BotAggression(bs) < 50) return qfalse;
2516 //the bot should have at least have the rocket launcher, the railgun or the bfg10k with some ammo
2517 if ((bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETLAUNCHER] <= 0 || bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETS] < 10) &&
2518 (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_RAILGUN] <= 0 || bs->inventory[INVENTORY_SLUGS] < 10) &&
2519 (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFG10K] <= 0 || bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFGAMMO] < 10)) {
2520 return qfalse;
2521 }
2522 //find the closest camp spot
2523 besttraveltime = 99999;
2524 for (cs = trap_BotGetNextCampSpotGoal(0, &goal); cs; cs = trap_BotGetNextCampSpotGoal(cs, &goal)) {
2525 traveltime = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, goal.areanum, TFL_DEFAULT);
2526 if (traveltime && traveltime < besttraveltime) {
2527 besttraveltime = traveltime;
2528 memcpy(&bestgoal, &goal, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
2529 }
2530 }
2531 if (besttraveltime > 150) return qfalse;
2532 //ok found a camp spot, go camp there
2533 BotGoCamp(bs, &bestgoal);
2534 bs->ordered = qfalse;
2535 //
2536 return qtrue;
2537}

2544void BotDontAvoid(bot_state_t *bs, char *itemname) {
2545 bot_goal_t goal;

2549 while(num >= 0) {

2552 }
2553}

2574/*
2575==================
2576BotRoamGoal
2577==================
2578*/
2579void BotRoamGoal(bot_state_t *bs, vec3_t goal) {
2580 int pc, i;
2581 float len, rnd;
2582 vec3_t dir, bestorg, belowbestorg;
2583 bsp_trace_t trace;
2584
2585 for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
2586 //start at the bot origin
2587 VectorCopy(bs->origin, bestorg);
2588 rnd = random();
2589 if (rnd > 0.25) {
2590 //add a random value to the x-coordinate
2591 if (random() < 0.5) bestorg[0] -= 800 * random() + 100;
2592 else bestorg[0] += 800 * random() + 100;
2593 }
2594 if (rnd < 0.75) {
2595 //add a random value to the y-coordinate
2596 if (random() < 0.5) bestorg[1] -= 800 * random() + 100;
2597 else bestorg[1] += 800 * random() + 100;
2598 }
2599 //add a random value to the z-coordinate (NOTE: 48 = maxjump?)
2600 bestorg[2] += 2 * 48 * crandom();
2601 //trace a line from the origin to the roam target
2602 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->origin, NULL, NULL, bestorg, bs->entitynum, MASK_SOLID);
2603 //direction and length towards the roam target
2604 VectorSubtract(trace.endpos, bs->origin, dir);
2605 len = VectorNormalize(dir);
2606 //if the roam target is far away enough
2607 if (len > 200) {
2608 //the roam target is in the given direction before walls
2609 VectorScale(dir, len * trace.fraction - 40, dir);
2610 VectorAdd(bs->origin, dir, bestorg);
2611 //get the coordinates of the floor below the roam target
2612 belowbestorg[0] = bestorg[0];
2613 belowbestorg[1] = bestorg[1];
2614 belowbestorg[2] = bestorg[2] - 800;
2615 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bestorg, NULL, NULL, belowbestorg, bs->entitynum, MASK_SOLID);
2616 //
2617 if (!trace.startsolid) {
2618 trace.endpos[2]++;
2619 pc = trap_PointContents(trace.endpos, bs->entitynum);
2620 if (!(pc & (CONTENTS_LAVA | CONTENTS_SLIME))) {
2621 VectorCopy(bestorg, goal);
2622 return;
2623 }
2624 }
2625 }
2626 }
2627 VectorCopy(bestorg, goal);
2628}
2629
2630/*
2631==================
2632BotAttackMove
2633==================
2634*/
2635bot_moveresult_t BotAttackMove(bot_state_t *bs, int tfl) {
2636 int movetype, i, attackentity;
2637 float attack_skill, jumper, croucher, dist, strafechange_time;
2638 float attack_dist, attack_range;
2639 vec3_t forward, backward, sideward, hordir, up = {0, 0, 1};
2640 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
2641 bot_moveresult_t moveresult;
2642 bot_goal_t goal;
2643
2644 attackentity = bs->enemy;
2645 //
2646 if (bs->attackchase_time > FloatTime()) {
2647 //create the chase goal
2648 goal.entitynum = attackentity;
2649 goal.areanum = bs->lastenemyareanum;
2650 VectorCopy(bs->lastenemyorigin, goal.origin);
2651 VectorSet(goal.mins, -8, -8, -8);
2652 VectorSet(goal.maxs, 8, 8, 8);
2653 //initialize the movement state
2654 BotSetupForMovement(bs);
2655 //move towards the goal
2656 trap_BotMoveToGoal(&moveresult, bs->ms, &goal, tfl);
2657 return moveresult;
2658 }
2659 //
2660 memset(&moveresult, 0, sizeof(bot_moveresult_t));
2661 //
2662 attack_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_ATTACK_SKILL, 0, 1);
2663 jumper = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_JUMPER, 0, 1);
2664 croucher = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_CROUCHER, 0, 1);
2665 //if the bot is really stupid
2666 if (attack_skill < 0.2) return moveresult;
2667 //initialize the movement state
2668 BotSetupForMovement(bs);
2669 //get the enemy entity info
2670 BotEntityInfo(attackentity, &entinfo);
2671 //direction towards the enemy
2672 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, forward);
2673 //the distance towards the enemy
2674 dist = VectorNormalize(forward);
2675 VectorNegate(forward, backward);
2676 //walk, crouch or jump
2677 movetype = MOVE_WALK;
2678 //
2679 if (bs->attackcrouch_time < FloatTime() - 1) {
2680 if (random() < jumper) {
2681 movetype = MOVE_JUMP;
2682 }
2683 //wait at least one second before crouching again
2684 else if (bs->attackcrouch_time < FloatTime() - 1 && random() < croucher) {
2685 bs->attackcrouch_time = FloatTime() + croucher * 5;
2686 }
2687 }
2688 if (bs->attackcrouch_time > FloatTime()) movetype = MOVE_CROUCH;
2689 //if the bot should jump
2690 if (movetype == MOVE_JUMP) {
2691 //if jumped last frame
2692 if (bs->attackjump_time > FloatTime()) {
2693 movetype = MOVE_WALK;
2694 }
2695 else {
2696 bs->attackjump_time = FloatTime() + 1;
2697 }
2698 }
2699 if (bs->cur_ps.weapon == WP_GAUNTLET) {
2700 attack_dist = 0;
2701 attack_range = 0;
2702 }
2703 else {
2704 attack_dist = IDEAL_ATTACKDIST;
2705 attack_range = 40;
2706 }
2707 //if the bot is stupid
2708 if (attack_skill <= 0.4) {
2709 //just walk to or away from the enemy
2710 if (dist > attack_dist + attack_range) {
2711 if (trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, forward, 400, movetype)) return moveresult;
2712 }
2713 if (dist < attack_dist - attack_range) {
2714 if (trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, backward, 400, movetype)) return moveresult;
2715 }
2716 return moveresult;
2717 }
2718 //increase the strafe time
2719 bs->attackstrafe_time += bs->thinktime;
2720 //get the strafe change time
2721 strafechange_time = 0.4 + (1 - attack_skill) * 0.2;
2722 if (attack_skill > 0.7) strafechange_time += crandom() * 0.2;
2723 //if the strafe direction should be changed
2724 if (bs->attackstrafe_time > strafechange_time) {
2725 //some magic number :)
2726 if (random() > 0.935) {
2727 //flip the strafe direction
2728 bs->flags ^= BFL_STRAFERIGHT;
2729 bs->attackstrafe_time = 0;
2730 }
2731 }
2732 //
2733 for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
2734 hordir[0] = forward[0];
2735 hordir[1] = forward[1];
2736 hordir[2] = 0;
2737 VectorNormalize(hordir);
2738 //get the sideward vector
2739 CrossProduct(hordir, up, sideward);
2740 //reverse the vector depending on the strafe direction
2741 if (bs->flags & BFL_STRAFERIGHT) VectorNegate(sideward, sideward);
2742 //randomly go back a little
2743 if (random() > 0.9) {
2744 VectorAdd(sideward, backward, sideward);
2745 }
2746 else {
2747 //walk forward or backward to get at the ideal attack distance
2748 if (dist > attack_dist + attack_range) {
2749 VectorAdd(sideward, forward, sideward);
2750 }
2751 else if (dist < attack_dist - attack_range) {
2752 VectorAdd(sideward, backward, sideward);
2753 }
2754 }
2755 //perform the movement
2756 if (trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, sideward, 400, movetype))
2757 return moveresult;
2758 //movement failed, flip the strafe direction
2759 bs->flags ^= BFL_STRAFERIGHT;
2760 bs->attackstrafe_time = 0;
2761 }
2762 //bot couldn't do any usefull movement
2763// bs->attackchase_time = AAS_Time() + 6;
2764 return moveresult;
2765}
2766
2767/*
2768==================
2769BotSameTeam
2770==================
2771*/
2772int BotSameTeam(bot_state_t *bs, int entnum) {
2773
2774 if (bs->client < 0 || bs->client >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
2775 return qfalse;
2776 }
2777
2778 if (entnum < 0 || entnum >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
2779 return qfalse;
2780 }
2781
2782 if (gametype >= GT_TEAM) {
2783 if (level.clients[bs->client].sess.sessionTeam == level.clients[entnum].sess.sessionTeam) return qtrue;
2784 }
2785
2786 return qfalse;
2787}
2788
2789/*
2790==================
2791InFieldOfVision
2792==================
2793*/
2794qboolean InFieldOfVision(vec3_t viewangles, float fov, vec3_t angles)
2795{
2796 int i;
2797 float diff, angle;
2798
2799 for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
2800 angle = AngleMod(viewangles[i]);
2801 angles[i] = AngleMod(angles[i]);
2802 diff = angles[i] - angle;
2803 if (angles[i] > angle) {
2804 if (diff > 180.0) diff -= 360.0;
2805 }
2806 else {
2807 if (diff < -180.0) diff += 360.0;
2808 }
2809 if (diff > 0) {
2810 if (diff > fov * 0.5) return qfalse;
2811 }
2812 else {
2813 if (diff < -fov * 0.5) return qfalse;
2814 }
2815 }
2816 return qtrue;
2817}
2818
2819/*
2820==================
2821BotEntityVisible
2822
2823returns visibility in the range [0, 1] taking fog and water surfaces into account
2824==================
2825*/
2826float BotEntityVisible(int viewer, vec3_t eye, vec3_t viewangles, float fov, int ent) {
2827 int i, contents_mask, passent, hitent, infog, inwater, otherinfog, pc;
2828 float squaredfogdist, waterfactor, vis, bestvis;
2829 bsp_trace_t trace;
2830 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
2831 vec3_t dir, entangles, start, end, middle;
2832
2833 BotEntityInfo(ent, &entinfo);
2834 if (!entinfo.valid) {
2835 return 0;
2836 }
2837
2838 //calculate middle of bounding box
2839 VectorAdd(entinfo.mins, entinfo.maxs, middle);
2840 VectorScale(middle, 0.5, middle);
2841 VectorAdd(entinfo.origin, middle, middle);
2842 //check if entity is within field of vision
2843 VectorSubtract(middle, eye, dir);
2844 vectoangles(dir, entangles);
2845 if (!InFieldOfVision(viewangles, fov, entangles)) return 0;
2846 //
2847 pc = trap_AAS_PointContents(eye);
2848 infog = (pc & CONTENTS_FOG);
2849 inwater = (pc & (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER));
2850 //
2851 bestvis = 0;
2852 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
2853 //if the point is not in potential visible sight
2854 //if (!AAS_inPVS(eye, middle)) continue;
2855 //
2856 contents_mask = CONTENTS_SOLID|CONTENTS_PLAYERCLIP;
2857 passent = viewer;
2858 hitent = ent;
2859 VectorCopy(eye, start);
2860 VectorCopy(middle, end);
2861 //if the entity is in water, lava or slime
2862 if (trap_AAS_PointContents(middle) & (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER)) {
2863 contents_mask |= (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER);
2864 }
2865 //if eye is in water, lava or slime
2866 if (inwater) {
2867 if (!(contents_mask & (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER))) {
2868 passent = ent;
2869 hitent = viewer;
2870 VectorCopy(middle, start);
2871 VectorCopy(eye, end);
2872 }
2873 contents_mask ^= (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER);
2874 }
2875 //trace from start to end
2876 BotAI_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, end, passent, contents_mask);
2877 //if water was hit
2878 waterfactor = 1.0;
2879 //note: trace.contents is always 0, see BotAI_Trace
2880 if (trace.contents & (CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER)) {
2881 //if the water surface is translucent
2882 if (1) {
2883 //trace through the water
2884 contents_mask &= ~(CONTENTS_LAVA|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_WATER);
2885 BotAI_Trace(&trace, trace.endpos, NULL, NULL, end, passent, contents_mask);
2886 waterfactor = 0.5;
2887 }
2888 }
2889 //if a full trace or the hitent was hit
2890 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == hitent) {
2891 //check for fog, assuming there's only one fog brush where
2892 //either the viewer or the entity is in or both are in
2893 otherinfog = (trap_AAS_PointContents(middle) & CONTENTS_FOG);
2894 if (infog && otherinfog) {
2895 VectorSubtract(trace.endpos, eye, dir);
2896 squaredfogdist = VectorLengthSquared(dir);
2897 }
2898 else if (infog) {
2899 VectorCopy(trace.endpos, start);
2900 BotAI_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, eye, viewer, CONTENTS_FOG);
2901 VectorSubtract(eye, trace.endpos, dir);
2902 squaredfogdist = VectorLengthSquared(dir);
2903 }
2904 else if (otherinfog) {
2905 VectorCopy(trace.endpos, end);
2906 BotAI_Trace(&trace, eye, NULL, NULL, end, viewer, CONTENTS_FOG);
2907 VectorSubtract(end, trace.endpos, dir);
2908 squaredfogdist = VectorLengthSquared(dir);
2909 }
2910 else {
2911 //if the entity and the viewer are not in fog assume there's no fog in between
2912 squaredfogdist = 0;
2913 }
2914 //decrease visibility with the view distance through fog
2915 vis = 1 / ((squaredfogdist * 0.001) < 1 ? 1 : (squaredfogdist * 0.001));
2916 //if entering water visibility is reduced
2917 vis *= waterfactor;
2918 //
2919 if (vis > bestvis) bestvis = vis;
2920 //if pretty much no fog
2921 if (bestvis >= 0.95) return bestvis;
2922 }
2923 //check bottom and top of bounding box as well
2924 if (i == 0) middle[2] += entinfo.mins[2];
2925 else if (i == 1) middle[2] += entinfo.maxs[2] - entinfo.mins[2];
2926 }
2927 return bestvis;
2928}
2929
2930/*
2931==================
2932BotFindEnemy
2933==================
2934*/
2935int BotFindEnemy(bot_state_t *bs, int curenemy) {
2936 int i, healthdecrease;
2937 float f, alertness, easyfragger, vis;
2938 float squaredist, cursquaredist;
2939 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo, curenemyinfo;
2940 vec3_t dir, angles;
2941
2942 alertness = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_ALERTNESS, 0, 1);
2943 easyfragger = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_EASY_FRAGGER, 0, 1);
2944 //check if the health decreased
2945 healthdecrease = bs->lasthealth > bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH];
2946 //remember the current health value
2947 bs->lasthealth = bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH];
2948 //
2949 if (curenemy >= 0) {
2950 BotEntityInfo(curenemy, &curenemyinfo);
2951 if (EntityCarriesFlag(&curenemyinfo)) return qfalse;
2952 VectorSubtract(curenemyinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
2953 cursquaredist = VectorLengthSquared(dir);
2954 }
2955 else {
2956 cursquaredist = 0;
2957 }
2958#ifdef MISSIONPACK
2959 if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
2960 vec3_t target;
2961 bot_goal_t *goal;
2962 bsp_trace_t trace;
2963
2964 if (BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED)
2965 goal = &blueobelisk;
2966 else
2967 goal = &redobelisk;
2968 //if the obelisk is visible
2969 VectorCopy(goal->origin, target);
2970 target[2] += 1;
2971 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, target, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID);
2972 if (trace.fraction >= 1 || trace.ent == goal->entitynum) {
2973 if (goal->entitynum == bs->enemy) {
2974 return qfalse;
2975 }
2976 bs->enemy = goal->entitynum;
2977 bs->enemysight_time = FloatTime();
2978 bs->enemysuicide = qfalse;
2979 bs->enemydeath_time = 0;
2980 bs->enemyvisible_time = FloatTime();
2981 return qtrue;
2982 }
2983 }
2984#endif
2985 //
2986 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
2987
2988 if (i == bs->client) continue;
2989 //if it's the current enemy
2990 if (i == curenemy) continue;
2991 //if the enemy has targeting disabled
2992 if (g_entities[i].flags & FL_NOTARGET) {
2993 continue;
2994 }
2995 //
2996 BotEntityInfo(i, &entinfo);
2997 //
2998 if (!entinfo.valid) continue;
2999 //if the enemy isn't dead and the enemy isn't the bot self
3000 if (EntityIsDead(&entinfo) || entinfo.number == bs->entitynum) continue;
3001 //if the enemy is invisible and not shooting
3002 if (EntityIsInvisible(&entinfo) && !EntityIsShooting(&entinfo)) {
3003 continue;
3004 }
3005 //if not an easy fragger don't shoot at chatting players
3006 if (easyfragger < 0.5 && EntityIsChatting(&entinfo)) continue;
3007 //
3008 if (lastteleport_time > FloatTime() - 3) {
3009 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, lastteleport_origin, dir);
3010 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(70)) continue;
3011 }
3012 //calculate the distance towards the enemy
3013 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
3014 squaredist = VectorLengthSquared(dir);
3015 //if this entity is not carrying a flag
3016 if (!EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
3017 {
3018 //if this enemy is further away than the current one
3019 if (curenemy >= 0 && squaredist > cursquaredist) continue;
3020 } //end if
3021 //if the bot has no
3022 if (squaredist > Square(900.0 + alertness * 4000.0)) continue;
3023 //if on the same team
3024 if (BotSameTeam(bs, i)) continue;
3025 //if the bot's health decreased or the enemy is shooting
3026 if (curenemy < 0 && (healthdecrease || EntityIsShooting(&entinfo)))
3027 f = 360;
3028 else
3029 f = 90 + 90 - (90 - (squaredist > Square(810) ? Square(810) : squaredist) / (810 * 9));
3030 //check if the enemy is visible
3031 vis = BotEntityVisible(bs->entitynum, bs->eye, bs->viewangles, f, i);
3032 if (vis <= 0) continue;
3033 //if the enemy is quite far away, not shooting and the bot is not damaged
3034 if (curenemy < 0 && squaredist > Square(100) && !healthdecrease && !EntityIsShooting(&entinfo))
3035 {
3036 //check if we can avoid this enemy
3037 VectorSubtract(bs->origin, entinfo.origin, dir);
3038 vectoangles(dir, angles);
3039 //if the bot isn't in the fov of the enemy
3040 if (!InFieldOfVision(entinfo.angles, 90, angles)) {
3041 //update some stuff for this enemy
3042 BotUpdateBattleInventory(bs, i);
3043 //if the bot doesn't really want to fight
3044 if (BotWantsToRetreat(bs)) continue;
3045 }
3046 }
3047 //found an enemy
3048 bs->enemy = entinfo.number;
3049 if (curenemy >= 0) bs->enemysight_time = FloatTime() - 2;
3050 else bs->enemysight_time = FloatTime();
3051 bs->enemysuicide = qfalse;
3052 bs->enemydeath_time = 0;
3053 bs->enemyvisible_time = FloatTime();
3054 return qtrue;
3055 }
3056 return qfalse;
3057}

3060==================
3061BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible
3062==================
3063*/
3064int BotTeamFlagCarrierVisible(bot_state_t *bs) {

3067 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
3068
3069 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
3070 if (i == bs->client)
3071 continue;
3072 //
3073 BotEntityInfo(i, &entinfo);
3074 //if this player is active
3075 if (!entinfo.valid)
3076 continue;
3077 //if this player is carrying a flag
3078 if (!EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
3079 continue;
3080 //if the flag carrier is not on the same team
3081 if (!BotSameTeam(bs, i))
3082 continue;
3083 //if the flag carrier is not visible
3084 vis = BotEntityVisible(bs->entitynum, bs->eye, bs->viewangles, 360, i);
3085 if (vis <= 0)
3086 continue;
3087 //
3088 return i;
3089 }
3090 return -1;
3091}

3157==================
3158BotVisibleTeamMatesAndEnemies
3159==================
3160*/
3161void BotVisibleTeamMatesAndEnemies(bot_state_t *bs, int *teammates, int *enemies, float range) {
3162 int i;
3163 float vis;
3164 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
3165 vec3_t dir;
3166
3167 if (teammates)
3168 *teammates = 0;
3169 if (enemies)
3170 *enemies = 0;
3171 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
3172 if (i == bs->client)
3173 continue;
3174 //
3175 BotEntityInfo(i, &entinfo);
3176 //if this player is active
3177 if (!entinfo.valid)
3178 continue;
3179 //if this player is carrying a flag
3180 if (!EntityCarriesFlag(&entinfo))
3181 continue;
3182 //if not within range
3183 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
3184 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) > Square(range))
3185 continue;
3186 //if the flag carrier is not visible
3187 vis = BotEntityVisible(bs->entitynum, bs->eye, bs->viewangles, 360, i);
3188 if (vis <= 0)
3189 continue;
3190 //if the flag carrier is on the same team
3191 if (BotSameTeam(bs, i)) {
3192 if (teammates)
3193 (*teammates)++;
3194 }
3195 else {
3196 if (enemies)
3197 (*enemies)++;
3198 }
3199 }
3200}
