3266/*
3267==================
3268BotAimAtEnemy
3269==================
3270*/
3271void BotAimAtEnemy(bot_state_t *bs) {
3272 int i, enemyvisible;
3273 float dist, f, aim_skill, aim_accuracy, speed, reactiontime;
3274 vec3_t dir, bestorigin, end, start, groundtarget, cmdmove, enemyvelocity;
3275 vec3_t mins = {-4,-4,-4}, maxs = {4, 4, 4};
3276 weaponinfo_t wi;
3277 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
3278 bot_goal_t goal;
3279 bsp_trace_t trace;
3280 vec3_t target;
3281
3282 //if the bot has no enemy
3283 if (bs->enemy < 0) {
3284 return;
3285 }
3286 //get the enemy entity information
3287 BotEntityInfo(bs->enemy, &entinfo);
3288 //if this is not a player (should be an obelisk)
3289 if (bs->enemy >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
3290 //if the obelisk is visible
3291 VectorCopy(entinfo.origin, target);
3292#ifdef MISSIONPACK
3293 // if attacking an obelisk
3294 if ( bs->enemy == redobelisk.entitynum ||
3295 bs->enemy == blueobelisk.entitynum ) {
3296 target[2] += 32;
3297 }
3298#endif
3299 //aim at the obelisk
3300 VectorSubtract(target, bs->eye, dir);
3301 vectoangles(dir, bs->ideal_viewangles);
3302 //set the aim target before trying to attack
3303 VectorCopy(target, bs->aimtarget);
3304 return;
3305 }
3306 //
3307 //BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "client %d: aiming at client %d\n", bs->entitynum, bs->enemy);
3308 //
3309 aim_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_SKILL, 0, 1);
3310 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY, 0, 1);
3311 //
3312 if (aim_skill > 0.95) {
3313 //don't aim too early
3314 reactiontime = 0.5 * trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_REACTIONTIME, 0, 1);
3315 if (bs->enemysight_time > FloatTime() - reactiontime) return;
3316 if (bs->teleport_time > FloatTime() - reactiontime) return;
3317 }
3318
3319 //get the weapon information
3320 trap_BotGetWeaponInfo(bs->ws, bs->weaponnum, &wi);
3321 //get the weapon specific aim accuracy and or aim skill
3322 if (wi.number == WP_MACHINEGUN) {
3323 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_MACHINEGUN, 0, 1);
3324 }
3325 else if (wi.number == WP_SHOTGUN) {
3326 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_SHOTGUN, 0, 1);
3327 }
3328 else if (wi.number == WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER) {
3329 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_GRENADELAUNCHER, 0, 1);
3330 aim_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_SKILL_GRENADELAUNCHER, 0, 1);
3331 }
3332 else if (wi.number == WP_ROCKET_LAUNCHER) {
3333 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_ROCKETLAUNCHER, 0, 1);
3334 aim_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_SKILL_ROCKETLAUNCHER, 0, 1);
3335 }
3336 else if (wi.number == WP_LIGHTNING) {
3337 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_LIGHTNING, 0, 1);
3338 }
3339 else if (wi.number == WP_RAILGUN) {
3340 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_RAILGUN, 0, 1);
3341 }
3342 else if (wi.number == WP_PLASMAGUN) {
3343 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_PLASMAGUN, 0, 1);
3344 aim_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_SKILL_PLASMAGUN, 0, 1);
3345 }
3346 else if (wi.number == WP_BFG) {
3347 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY_BFG10K, 0, 1);
3348 aim_skill = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_SKILL_BFG10K, 0, 1);
3349 }
3350 //
3351 if (aim_accuracy <= 0) aim_accuracy = 0.0001f;
3352 //get the enemy entity information
3353 BotEntityInfo(bs->enemy, &entinfo);
3354 //if the enemy is invisible then shoot crappy most of the time
3355 if (EntityIsInvisible(&entinfo)) {
3356 if (random() > 0.1) aim_accuracy *= 0.4f;
3357 }
3358 //
3359 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, entinfo.lastvisorigin, enemyvelocity);
3360 VectorScale(enemyvelocity, 1 / entinfo.update_time, enemyvelocity);
3361 //enemy origin and velocity is remembered every 0.5 seconds
3362 if (bs->enemyposition_time < FloatTime()) {
3363 //
3364 bs->enemyposition_time = FloatTime() + 0.5;
3365 VectorCopy(enemyvelocity, bs->enemyvelocity);
3366 VectorCopy(entinfo.origin, bs->enemyorigin);
3367 }
3368 //if not extremely skilled
3369 if (aim_skill < 0.9) {
3370 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->enemyorigin, dir);
3371 //if the enemy moved a bit
3372 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) > Square(48)) {
3373 //if the enemy changed direction
3374 if (DotProduct(bs->enemyvelocity, enemyvelocity) < 0) {
3375 //aim accuracy should be worse now
3376 aim_accuracy *= 0.7f;
3377 }
3378 }
3379 }
3380 //check visibility of enemy
3381 enemyvisible = BotEntityVisible(bs->entitynum, bs->eye, bs->viewangles, 360, bs->enemy);
3382 //if the enemy is visible
3383 if (enemyvisible) {
3384 //
3385 VectorCopy(entinfo.origin, bestorigin);
3386 bestorigin[2] += 8;
3387 //get the start point shooting from
3388 //NOTE: the x and y projectile start offsets are ignored
3389 VectorCopy(bs->origin, start);
3390 start[2] += bs->cur_ps.viewheight;
3391 start[2] += wi.offset[2];
3392 //
3393 BotAI_Trace(&trace, start, mins, maxs, bestorigin, bs->entitynum, MASK_SHOT);
3394 //if the enemy is NOT hit
3395 if (trace.fraction <= 1 && trace.ent != entinfo.number) {
3396 bestorigin[2] += 16;
3397 }
3398 //if it is not an instant hit weapon the bot might want to predict the enemy
3399 if (wi.speed) {
3400 //
3401 VectorSubtract(bestorigin, bs->origin, dir);
3402 dist = VectorLength(dir);
3403 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->enemyorigin, dir);
3404 //if the enemy is NOT pretty far away and strafing just small steps left and right
3405 if (!(dist > 100 && VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(32))) {
3406 //if skilled enough do exact prediction
3407 if (aim_skill > 0.8 &&
3408 //if the weapon is ready to fire
3409 bs->cur_ps.weaponstate == WEAPON_READY) {
3410 aas_clientmove_t move;
3411 vec3_t origin;
3412
3413 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
3414 //distance towards the enemy
3415 dist = VectorLength(dir);
3416 //direction the enemy is moving in
3417 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, entinfo.lastvisorigin, dir);
3418 //
3419 VectorScale(dir, 1 / entinfo.update_time, dir);
3420 //
3421 VectorCopy(entinfo.origin, origin);
3422 origin[2] += 1;
3423 //
3424 VectorClear(cmdmove);
3425 //AAS_ClearShownDebugLines();
3426 trap_AAS_PredictClientMovement(&move, bs->enemy, origin,
3427 PRESENCE_CROUCH, qfalse,
3428 dir, cmdmove, 0,
3429 dist * 10 / wi.speed, 0.1f, 0, 0, qfalse);
3430 VectorCopy(move.endpos, bestorigin);
3431 //BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "%1.1f predicted speed = %f, frames = %f\n", FloatTime(), VectorLength(dir), dist * 10 / wi.speed);
3432 }
3433 //if not that skilled do linear prediction
3434 else if (aim_skill > 0.4) {
3435 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, bs->origin, dir);
3436 //distance towards the enemy
3437 dist = VectorLength(dir);
3438 //direction the enemy is moving in
3439 VectorSubtract(entinfo.origin, entinfo.lastvisorigin, dir);
3440 dir[2] = 0;
3441 //
3442 speed = VectorNormalize(dir) / entinfo.update_time;
3443 //botimport.Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "speed = %f, wi->speed = %f\n", speed, wi->speed);
3444 //best spot to aim at
3445 VectorMA(entinfo.origin, (dist / wi.speed) * speed, dir, bestorigin);
3446 }
3447 }
3448 }
3449 //if the projectile does radial damage
3450 if (aim_skill > 0.6 && wi.proj.damagetype & DAMAGETYPE_RADIAL) {
3451 //if the enemy isn't standing significantly higher than the bot
3452 if (entinfo.origin[2] < bs->origin[2] + 16) {
3453 //try to aim at the ground in front of the enemy
3454 VectorCopy(entinfo.origin, end);
3455 end[2] -= 64;
3456 BotAI_Trace(&trace, entinfo.origin, NULL, NULL, end, entinfo.number, MASK_SHOT);
3457 //
3458 VectorCopy(bestorigin, groundtarget);
3459 if (trace.startsolid) groundtarget[2] = entinfo.origin[2] - 16;
3460 else groundtarget[2] = trace.endpos[2] - 8;
3461 //trace a line from projectile start to ground target
3462 BotAI_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, groundtarget, bs->entitynum, MASK_SHOT);
3463 //if hitpoint is not vertically too far from the ground target
3464 if (fabs(trace.endpos[2] - groundtarget[2]) < 50) {
3465 VectorSubtract(trace.endpos, groundtarget, dir);
3466 //if the hitpoint is near enough the ground target
3467 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(60)) {
3468 VectorSubtract(trace.endpos, start, dir);
3469 //if the hitpoint is far enough from the bot
3470 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) > Square(100)) {
3471 //check if the bot is visible from the ground target
3472 trace.endpos[2] += 1;
3473 BotAI_Trace(&trace, trace.endpos, NULL, NULL, entinfo.origin, entinfo.number, MASK_SHOT);
3474 if (trace.fraction >= 1) {
3475 //botimport.Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "%1.1f aiming at ground\n", AAS_Time());
3476 VectorCopy(groundtarget, bestorigin);
3477 }
3478 }
3479 }
3480 }
3481 }
3482 }
3483 bestorigin[0] += 20 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3484 bestorigin[1] += 20 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3485 bestorigin[2] += 10 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3486 }
3487 else {
3488 //
3489 VectorCopy(bs->lastenemyorigin, bestorigin);
3490 bestorigin[2] += 8;
3491 //if the bot is skilled enough
3492 if (aim_skill > 0.5) {
3493 //do prediction shots around corners
3494 if (wi.number == WP_BFG ||
3495 wi.number == WP_ROCKET_LAUNCHER ||
3496 wi.number == WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER) {
3497 //create the chase goal
3498 goal.entitynum = bs->client;
3499 goal.areanum = bs->areanum;
3500 VectorCopy(bs->eye, goal.origin);
3501 VectorSet(goal.mins, -8, -8, -8);
3502 VectorSet(goal.maxs, 8, 8, 8);
3503 //
3504 if (trap_BotPredictVisiblePosition(bs->lastenemyorigin, bs->lastenemyareanum, &goal, TFL_DEFAULT, target)) {
3505 VectorSubtract(target, bs->eye, dir);
3506 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) > Square(80)) {
3507 VectorCopy(target, bestorigin);
3508 bestorigin[2] -= 20;
3509 }
3510 }
3511 aim_accuracy = 1;
3512 }
3513 }
3514 }
3515 //
3516 if (enemyvisible) {
3517 BotAI_Trace(&trace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, bestorigin, bs->entitynum, MASK_SHOT);
3518 VectorCopy(trace.endpos, bs->aimtarget);
3519 }
3520 else {
3521 VectorCopy(bestorigin, bs->aimtarget);
3522 }
3523 //get aim direction
3524 VectorSubtract(bestorigin, bs->eye, dir);
3525 //
3526 if (wi.number == WP_MACHINEGUN ||
3527 wi.number == WP_SHOTGUN ||
3528 wi.number == WP_LIGHTNING ||
3529 wi.number == WP_RAILGUN) {
3530 //distance towards the enemy
3531 dist = VectorLength(dir);
3532 if (dist > 150) dist = 150;
3533 f = 0.6 + dist / 150 * 0.4;
3534 aim_accuracy *= f;
3535 }
3536 //add some random stuff to the aim direction depending on the aim accuracy
3537 if (aim_accuracy < 0.8) {
3538 VectorNormalize(dir);
3539 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) dir[i] += 0.3 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3540 }
3541 //set the ideal view angles
3542 vectoangles(dir, bs->ideal_viewangles);
3543 //take the weapon spread into account for lower skilled bots
3544 bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] += 6 * wi.vspread * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3545 bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] = AngleMod(bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH]);
3546 bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW] += 6 * wi.hspread * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3547 bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW] = AngleMod(bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW]);
3548 //if the bots should be really challenging
3549 if (bot_challenge.integer) {
3550 //if the bot is really accurate and has the enemy in view for some time
3551 if (aim_accuracy > 0.9 && bs->enemysight_time < FloatTime() - 1) {
3552 //set the view angles directly
3553 if (bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] > 180) bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] -= 360;
3554 VectorCopy(bs->ideal_viewangles, bs->viewangles);
3555 trap_EA_View(bs->client, bs->viewangles);
3556 }
3557 }
3558}
3559
3560/*
3561==================
3562BotCheckAttack
3563==================
3564*/
3565void BotCheckAttack(bot_state_t *bs) {
3566 float points, reactiontime, fov, firethrottle;
3567 int attackentity;
3568 bsp_trace_t bsptrace;
3569 //float selfpreservation;
3570 vec3_t forward, right, start, end, dir, angles;
3571 weaponinfo_t wi;
3572 bsp_trace_t trace;
3573 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
3574 vec3_t mins = {-8, -8, -8}, maxs = {8, 8, 8};
3575
3576 attackentity = bs->enemy;
3577 //
3578 BotEntityInfo(attackentity, &entinfo);
3579 // if not attacking a player
3580 if (attackentity >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
3581#ifdef MISSIONPACK
3582 // if attacking an obelisk
3583 if ( entinfo.number == redobelisk.entitynum ||
3584 entinfo.number == blueobelisk.entitynum ) {
3585 // if obelisk is respawning return
3586 if ( g_entities[entinfo.number].activator &&
3587 g_entities[entinfo.number].activator->s.frame == 2 ) {
3588 return;
3589 }
3590 }
3591#endif
3592 }
3593 //
3594 reactiontime = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_REACTIONTIME, 0, 1);
3595 if (bs->enemysight_time > FloatTime() - reactiontime) return;
3596 if (bs->teleport_time > FloatTime() - reactiontime) return;
3597 //if changing weapons
3598 if (bs->weaponchange_time > FloatTime() - 0.1) return;
3599 //check fire throttle characteristic
3600 if (bs->firethrottlewait_time > FloatTime()) return;
3601 firethrottle = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_FIRETHROTTLE, 0, 1);
3602 if (bs->firethrottleshoot_time < FloatTime()) {
3603 if (random() > firethrottle) {
3604 bs->firethrottlewait_time = FloatTime() + firethrottle;
3605 bs->firethrottleshoot_time = 0;
3606 }
3607 else {
3608 bs->firethrottleshoot_time = FloatTime() + 1 - firethrottle;
3609 bs->firethrottlewait_time = 0;
3610 }
3611 }
3612 //
3613 //
3614 VectorSubtract(bs->aimtarget, bs->eye, dir);
3615 //
3616 if (bs->weaponnum == WP_GAUNTLET) {
3617 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) > Square(60)) {
3618 return;
3619 }
3620 }
3621 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(100))
3622 fov = 120;
3623 else
3624 fov = 50;
3625 //
3626 vectoangles(dir, angles);
3627 if (!InFieldOfVision(bs->viewangles, fov, angles))
3628 return;
3629 BotAI_Trace(&bsptrace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, bs->aimtarget, bs->client, CONTENTS_SOLID|CONTENTS_PLAYERCLIP);
3630 if (bsptrace.fraction < 1 && bsptrace.ent != attackentity)
3631 return;
3632
3633 //get the weapon info
3634 trap_BotGetWeaponInfo(bs->ws, bs->weaponnum, &wi);
3635 //get the start point shooting from
3636 VectorCopy(bs->origin, start);
3637 start[2] += bs->cur_ps.viewheight;
3638 AngleVectors(bs->viewangles, forward, right, NULL);
3639 start[0] += forward[0] * wi.offset[0] + right[0] * wi.offset[1];
3640 start[1] += forward[1] * wi.offset[0] + right[1] * wi.offset[1];
3641 start[2] += forward[2] * wi.offset[0] + right[2] * wi.offset[1] + wi.offset[2];
3642 //end point aiming at
3643 VectorMA(start, 1000, forward, end);
3644 //a little back to make sure not inside a very close enemy
3645 VectorMA(start, -12, forward, start);
3646 BotAI_Trace(&trace, start, mins, maxs, end, bs->entitynum, MASK_SHOT);
3647 //if the entity is a client
3648 if (trace.ent >= 0 && trace.ent < MAX_CLIENTS) {
3649 if (trace.ent != attackentity) {
3650 //if a teammate is hit
3651 if (BotSameTeam(bs, trace.ent))
3652 return;
3653 }
3654 }
3655 //if won't hit the enemy or not attacking a player (obelisk)
3656 if (trace.ent != attackentity || attackentity >= MAX_CLIENTS) {
3657 //if the projectile does radial damage
3658 if (wi.proj.damagetype & DAMAGETYPE_RADIAL) {
3659 if (trace.fraction * 1000 < wi.proj.radius) {
3660 points = (wi.proj.damage - 0.5 * trace.fraction * 1000) * 0.5;
3661 if (points > 0) {
3662 return;
3663 }
3664 }
3665 //FIXME: check if a teammate gets radial damage
3666 }
3667 }
3668 //if fire has to be release to activate weapon
3669 if (wi.flags & WFL_FIRERELEASED) {
3670 if (bs->flags & BFL_ATTACKED) {
3671 trap_EA_Attack(bs->client);
3672 }
3673 }
3674 else {
3675 trap_EA_Attack(bs->client);
3676 }
3677 bs->flags ^= BFL_ATTACKED;
3678}
3679
3680/*
3681==================
3682BotMapScripts
3683==================
3684*/
3685void BotMapScripts(bot_state_t *bs) {
3686 char info[1024];
3687 char mapname[128];
3688 int i, shootbutton;
3689 float aim_accuracy;
3690 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
3691 vec3_t dir;
3692
3693 trap_GetServerinfo(info, sizeof(info));
3694
3695 strncpy(mapname, Info_ValueForKey( info, "mapname" ), sizeof(mapname)-1);
3696 mapname[sizeof(mapname)-1] = '\0';
3697
3698 if (!Q_stricmp(mapname, "q3tourney6")) {
3699 vec3_t mins = {700, 204, 672}, maxs = {964, 468, 680};
3700 vec3_t buttonorg = {304, 352, 920};
3701 //NOTE: NEVER use the func_bobbing in q3tourney6
3702 bs->tfl &= ~TFL_FUNCBOB;
3703 //if the bot is below the bounding box
3704 if (bs->origin[0] > mins[0] && bs->origin[0] < maxs[0]) {
3705 if (bs->origin[1] > mins[1] && bs->origin[1] < maxs[1]) {
3706 if (bs->origin[2] < mins[2]) {
3707 return;
3708 }
3709 }
3710 }
3711 shootbutton = qfalse;
3712 //if an enemy is below this bounding box then shoot the button
3713 for (i = 0; i < level.maxclients; i++) {
3714
3715 if (i == bs->client) continue;
3716 //
3717 BotEntityInfo(i, &entinfo);
3718 //
3719 if (!entinfo.valid) continue;
3720 //if the enemy isn't dead and the enemy isn't the bot self
3721 if (EntityIsDead(&entinfo) || entinfo.number == bs->entitynum) continue;
3722 //
3723 if (entinfo.origin[0] > mins[0] && entinfo.origin[0] < maxs[0]) {
3724 if (entinfo.origin[1] > mins[1] && entinfo.origin[1] < maxs[1]) {
3725 if (entinfo.origin[2] < mins[2]) {
3726 //if there's a team mate below the crusher
3727 if (BotSameTeam(bs, i)) {
3728 shootbutton = qfalse;
3729 break;
3730 }
3731 else {
3732 shootbutton = qtrue;
3733 }
3734 }
3735 }
3736 }
3737 }
3738 if (shootbutton) {
3739 bs->flags |= BFL_IDEALVIEWSET;
3740 VectorSubtract(buttonorg, bs->eye, dir);
3741 vectoangles(dir, bs->ideal_viewangles);
3742 aim_accuracy = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_AIM_ACCURACY, 0, 1);
3743 bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] += 8 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3744 bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH] = AngleMod(bs->ideal_viewangles[PITCH]);
3745 bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW] += 8 * crandom() * (1 - aim_accuracy);
3746 bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW] = AngleMod(bs->ideal_viewangles[YAW]);
3747 //
3748 if (InFieldOfVision(bs->viewangles, 20, bs->ideal_viewangles)) {
3749 trap_EA_Attack(bs->client);
3750 }
3751 }
3752 }
3753 else if (!Q_stricmp(mapname, "mpq3tourney6")) {
3754 //NOTE: NEVER use the func_bobbing in mpq3tourney6
3755 bs->tfl &= ~TFL_FUNCBOB;
3756 }
3757}
3758
3759/*
3760==================
3761BotSetMovedir
3762==================
3763*/
3764static vec3_t VEC_UP = {0, -1, 0};
3765static vec3_t MOVEDIR_UP = {0, 0, 1};
3766static vec3_t VEC_DOWN = {0, -2, 0};
3767static vec3_t MOVEDIR_DOWN = {0, 0, -1};
3768
3769void BotSetMovedir(vec3_t angles, vec3_t movedir) {
3770 if (VectorCompare(angles, VEC_UP)) {
3771 VectorCopy(MOVEDIR_UP, movedir);
3772 }
3773 else if (VectorCompare(angles, VEC_DOWN)) {
3774 VectorCopy(MOVEDIR_DOWN, movedir);
3775 }
3776 else {
3777 AngleVectors(angles, movedir, NULL, NULL);
3778 }
3779}
3780
3781/*
3782==================
3783BotModelMinsMaxs
3784
3785this is ugly
3786==================
3787*/
3788int BotModelMinsMaxs(int modelindex, int eType, int contents, vec3_t mins, vec3_t maxs) {
3789 gentity_t *ent;
3790 int i;
3791
3792 ent = &g_entities[0];
3793 for (i = 0; i < level.num_entities; i++, ent++) {
3794 if ( !ent->inuse ) {
3795 continue;
3796 }
3797 if ( eType && ent->s.eType != eType) {
3798 continue;
3799 }
3800 if ( contents && ent->r.contents != contents) {
3801 continue;
3802 }
3803 if (ent->s.modelindex == modelindex) {
3804 if (mins)
3805 VectorAdd(ent->r.currentOrigin, ent->r.mins, mins);
3806 if (maxs)
3807 VectorAdd(ent->r.currentOrigin, ent->r.maxs, maxs);
3808 return i;
3809 }
3810 }
3811 if (mins)
3812 VectorClear(mins);
3813 if (maxs)
3814 VectorClear(maxs);
3815 return 0;
3816}
3817
3818/*
3819==================
3820BotFuncButtonGoal
3821==================
3822*/
3823int BotFuncButtonActivateGoal(bot_state_t *bs, int bspent, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
3824 int i, areas[10], numareas, modelindex, entitynum;
3825 char model[128];
3826 float lip, dist, health, angle;
3827 vec3_t size, start, end, mins, maxs, angles, points[10];
3828 vec3_t movedir, origin, goalorigin, bboxmins, bboxmaxs;
3829 vec3_t extramins = {1, 1, 1}, extramaxs = {-1, -1, -1};
3830 bsp_trace_t bsptrace;
3831
3832 activategoal->shoot = qfalse;
3833 VectorClear(activategoal->target);
3834 //create a bot goal towards the button
3835 trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "model", model, sizeof(model));
3836 if (!*model)
3837 return qfalse;
3838 modelindex = atoi(model+1);
3839 if (!modelindex)
3840 return qfalse;
3841 entitynum = BotModelMinsMaxs(modelindex, ET_MOVER, 0, mins, maxs);
3842 //get the lip of the button
3843 trap_AAS_FloatForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "lip", &lip);
3844 if (!lip) lip = 4;
3845 //get the move direction from the angle
3846 trap_AAS_FloatForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "angle", &angle);
3847 VectorSet(angles, 0, angle, 0);
3848 BotSetMovedir(angles, movedir);
3849 //button size
3850 VectorSubtract(maxs, mins, size);
3851 //button origin
3852 VectorAdd(mins, maxs, origin);
3853 VectorScale(origin, 0.5, origin);
3854 //touch distance of the button
3855 dist = fabs(movedir[0]) * size[0] + fabs(movedir[1]) * size[1] + fabs(movedir[2]) * size[2];
3856 dist *= 0.5;
3857 //
3858 trap_AAS_FloatForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "health", &health);
3859 //if the button is shootable
3860 if (health) {
3861 //calculate the shoot target
3862 VectorMA(origin, -dist, movedir, goalorigin);
3863 //
3864 VectorCopy(goalorigin, activategoal->target);
3865 activategoal->shoot = qtrue;
3866 //
3867 BotAI_Trace(&bsptrace, bs->eye, NULL, NULL, goalorigin, bs->entitynum, MASK_SHOT);
3868 // if the button is visible from the current position
3869 if (bsptrace.fraction >= 1.0 || bsptrace.ent == entitynum) {
3870 //
3871 activategoal->goal.entitynum = entitynum; //NOTE: this is the entity number of the shootable button
3872 activategoal->goal.number = 0;
3873 activategoal->goal.flags = 0;
3874 VectorCopy(bs->origin, activategoal->goal.origin);
3875 activategoal->goal.areanum = bs->areanum;
3876 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.mins, -8, -8, -8);
3877 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.maxs, 8, 8, 8);
3878 //
3879 return qtrue;
3880 }
3881 else {
3882 //create a goal from where the button is visible and shoot at the button from there
3883 //add bounding box size to the dist
3884 trap_AAS_PresenceTypeBoundingBox(PRESENCE_CROUCH, bboxmins, bboxmaxs);
3885 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
3886 if (movedir[i] < 0) dist += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(bboxmaxs[i]);
3887 else dist += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(bboxmins[i]);
3888 }
3889 //calculate the goal origin
3890 VectorMA(origin, -dist, movedir, goalorigin);
3891 //
3892 VectorCopy(goalorigin, start);
3893 start[2] += 24;
3894 VectorCopy(start, end);
3895 end[2] -= 512;
3896 numareas = trap_AAS_TraceAreas(start, end, areas, points, 10);
3897 //
3898 for (i = numareas-1; i >= 0; i--) {
3899 if (trap_AAS_AreaReachability(areas[i])) {
3900 break;
3901 }
3902 }
3903 if (i < 0) {
3904 // FIXME: trace forward and maybe in other directions to find a valid area
3905 }
3906 if (i >= 0) {
3907 //
3908 VectorCopy(points[i], activategoal->goal.origin);
3909 activategoal->goal.areanum = areas[i];
3910 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.mins, 8, 8, 8);
3911 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.maxs, -8, -8, -8);
3912 //
3913 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
3914 {
3915 if (movedir[i] < 0) activategoal->goal.maxs[i] += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(extramaxs[i]);
3916 else activategoal->goal.mins[i] += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(extramins[i]);
3917 } //end for
3918 //
3919 activategoal->goal.entitynum = entitynum;
3920 activategoal->goal.number = 0;
3921 activategoal->goal.flags = 0;
3922 return qtrue;
3923 }
3924 }
3925 return qfalse;
3926 }
3927 else {
3928 //add bounding box size to the dist
3929 trap_AAS_PresenceTypeBoundingBox(PRESENCE_CROUCH, bboxmins, bboxmaxs);
3930 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
3931 if (movedir[i] < 0) dist += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(bboxmaxs[i]);
3932 else dist += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(bboxmins[i]);
3933 }
3934 //calculate the goal origin
3935 VectorMA(origin, -dist, movedir, goalorigin);
3936 //
3937 VectorCopy(goalorigin, start);
3938 start[2] += 24;
3939 VectorCopy(start, end);
3940 end[2] -= 100;
3941 numareas = trap_AAS_TraceAreas(start, end, areas, NULL, 10);
3942 //
3943 for (i = 0; i < numareas; i++) {
3944 if (trap_AAS_AreaReachability(areas[i])) {
3945 break;
3946 }
3947 }
3948 if (i < numareas) {
3949 //
3950 VectorCopy(origin, activategoal->goal.origin);
3951 activategoal->goal.areanum = areas[i];
3952 VectorSubtract(mins, origin, activategoal->goal.mins);
3953 VectorSubtract(maxs, origin, activategoal->goal.maxs);
3954 //
3955 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
3956 {
3957 if (movedir[i] < 0) activategoal->goal.maxs[i] += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(extramaxs[i]);
3958 else activategoal->goal.mins[i] += fabs(movedir[i]) * fabs(extramins[i]);
3959 } //end for
3960 //
3961 activategoal->goal.entitynum = entitynum;
3962 activategoal->goal.number = 0;
3963 activategoal->goal.flags = 0;
3964 return qtrue;
3965 }
3966 }
3967 return qfalse;
3968}

3970/*
3971==================
3972BotFuncDoorGoal
3973==================
3974*/
3975int BotFuncDoorActivateGoal(bot_state_t *bs, int bspent, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
3976 int modelindex, entitynum;
3977 char model[MAX_INFO_STRING];
3978 vec3_t mins, maxs, origin;
3979
3980 //shoot at the shootable door
3981 trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "model", model, sizeof(model));
3982 if (!*model)
3983 return qfalse;
3984 modelindex = atoi(model+1);
3985 if (!modelindex)
3986 return qfalse;
3987 entitynum = BotModelMinsMaxs(modelindex, ET_MOVER, 0, mins, maxs);
3988 //door origin
3989 VectorAdd(mins, maxs, origin);
3990 VectorScale(origin, 0.5, origin);
3991 VectorCopy(origin, activategoal->target);
3992 activategoal->shoot = qtrue;
3993 //
3994 activategoal->goal.entitynum = entitynum; //NOTE: this is the entity number of the shootable door
3995 activategoal->goal.number = 0;
3996 activategoal->goal.flags = 0;
3997 VectorCopy(bs->origin, activategoal->goal.origin);
3998 activategoal->goal.areanum = bs->areanum;
3999 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.mins, -8, -8, -8);
4000 VectorSet(activategoal->goal.maxs, 8, 8, 8);
4001 return qtrue;
4002}

4006BotTriggerMultipleGoal

4008*/
4009int BotTriggerMultipleActivateGoal(bot_state_t *bs, int bspent, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
4010 int i, areas[10], numareas, modelindex, entitynum;
4011 char model[128];
4012 vec3_t start, end, mins, maxs;
4013 vec3_t origin, goalorigin;
4014
4015 activategoal->shoot = qfalse;
4016 VectorClear(activategoal->target);
4017 //create a bot goal towards the trigger
4018 trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(bspent, "model", model, sizeof(model));
4019 if (!*model)
4020 return qfalse;
4021 modelindex = atoi(model+1);
4022 if (!modelindex)
4023 return qfalse;
4024 entitynum = BotModelMinsMaxs(modelindex, 0, CONTENTS_TRIGGER, mins, maxs);
4025 //trigger origin
4026 VectorAdd(mins, maxs, origin);
4027 VectorScale(origin, 0.5, origin);
4028 VectorCopy(origin, goalorigin);
4029 //
4030 VectorCopy(goalorigin, start);
4031 start[2] += 24;
4032 VectorCopy(start, end);
4033 end[2] -= 100;
4034 numareas = trap_AAS_TraceAreas(start, end, areas, NULL, 10);
4035 //
4036 for (i = 0; i < numareas; i++) {
4037 if (trap_AAS_AreaReachability(areas[i])) {

4045 VectorSubtract(maxs, origin, activategoal->goal.maxs);
4046 //
4047 activategoal->goal.entitynum = entitynum;
4048 activategoal->goal.number = 0;
4049 activategoal->goal.flags = 0;

4051 }

4055/*
4056==================
4057BotPopFromActivateGoalStack
4058==================
4059*/
4060int BotPopFromActivateGoalStack(bot_state_t *bs) {
4061 if (!bs->activatestack)
4062 return qfalse;
4063 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas(bs->activatestack, qtrue);
4064 bs->activatestack->inuse = qfalse;
4065 bs->activatestack->justused_time = FloatTime();
4066 bs->activatestack = bs->activatestack->next;
4067 return qtrue;
4068}
4069
4070/*
4071==================
4072BotPushOntoActivateGoalStack
4073==================
4074*/
4075int BotPushOntoActivateGoalStack(bot_state_t *bs, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
4076 int i, best;
4077 float besttime;
4078
4079 best = -1;
4080 besttime = FloatTime() + 9999;
4081 //
4082 for (i = 0; i < MAX_ACTIVATESTACK; i++) {
4083 if (!bs->activategoalheap[i].inuse) {
4084 if (bs->activategoalheap[i].justused_time < besttime) {
4085 besttime = bs->activategoalheap[i].justused_time;
4086 best = i;
4087 }
4088 }
4089 }
4090 if (best != -1) {
4091 memcpy(&bs->activategoalheap[best], activategoal, sizeof(bot_activategoal_t));
4092 bs->activategoalheap[best].inuse = qtrue;
4093 bs->activategoalheap[best].next = bs->activatestack;
4094 bs->activatestack = &bs->activategoalheap[best];
4095 return qtrue;
4096 }
4097 return qfalse;
4098}

4102BotClearActivateGoalStack
4103==================
4104*/
4105void BotClearActivateGoalStack(bot_state_t *bs) {
4106 while(bs->activatestack)
4107 BotPopFromActivateGoalStack(bs);
4108}

4111==================
4112BotEnableActivateGoalAreas
4113==================
4114*/
4115void BotEnableActivateGoalAreas(bot_activategoal_t *activategoal, int enable) {
4116 int i;
4117
4118 if (activategoal->areasdisabled == !enable)
4119 return;
4120 for (i = 0; i < activategoal->numareas; i++)
4121 trap_AAS_EnableRoutingArea( activategoal->areas[i], enable );
4122 activategoal->areasdisabled = !enable;
4123}

4125/*
4126==================
4127BotIsGoingToActivateEntity
4128==================
4129*/
4130int BotIsGoingToActivateEntity(bot_state_t *bs, int entitynum) {
4131 bot_activategoal_t *a;
4132 int i;
4133
4134 for (a = bs->activatestack; a; a = a->next) {
4135 if (a->time < FloatTime())
4136 continue;
4137 if (a->goal.entitynum == entitynum)
4138 return qtrue;
4139 }
4140 for (i = 0; i < MAX_ACTIVATESTACK; i++) {
4141 if (bs->activategoalheap[i].inuse)
4142 continue;
4143 //
4144 if (bs->activategoalheap[i].goal.entitynum == entitynum) {
4145 // if the bot went for this goal less than 2 seconds ago
4146 if (bs->activategoalheap[i].justused_time > FloatTime() - 2)
4147 return qtrue;
4148 }
4149 }
4150 return qfalse;
4151}

4153/*
4154==================
4155BotGetActivateGoal
4156
4157 returns the number of the bsp entity to activate
4158 goal->entitynum will be set to the game entity to activate
4159==================
4160*/
4161//#define OBSTACLEDEBUG
4162
4163int BotGetActivateGoal(bot_state_t *bs, int entitynum, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
4164 int i, ent, cur_entities[10], spawnflags, modelindex, areas[MAX_ACTIVATEAREAS*2], numareas, t;
4165 char model[MAX_INFO_STRING], tmpmodel[128];
4166 char target[128], classname[128];
4167 float health;
4168 char targetname[10][128];
4169 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
4170 aas_areainfo_t areainfo;
4171 vec3_t origin, absmins, absmaxs;
4172
4173 memset(activategoal, 0, sizeof(bot_activategoal_t));
4174 BotEntityInfo(entitynum, &entinfo);
4175 Com_sprintf(model, sizeof( model ), "*%d", entinfo.modelindex);
4176 for (ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(0); ent; ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(ent)) {
4177 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "model", tmpmodel, sizeof(tmpmodel))) continue;
4178 if (!strcmp(model, tmpmodel)) break;
4179 }
4180 if (!ent) {
4181 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: no entity found with model %s\n", model);
4182 return 0;
4183 }
4184 trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "classname", classname, sizeof(classname));
4185 if (!*classname) {
4186 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: entity with model %s has no classname\n", model);
4187 return 0;
4188 }
4189 //if it is a door
4190 if (!strcmp(classname, "func_door")) {
4191 if (trap_AAS_FloatForBSPEpairKey(ent, "health", &health)) {
4192 //if the door has health then the door must be shot to open
4193 if (health) {
4194 BotFuncDoorActivateGoal(bs, ent, activategoal);
4195 return ent;
4196 }
4197 }
4198 //
4199 trap_AAS_IntForBSPEpairKey(ent, "spawnflags", &spawnflags);
4200 // if the door starts open then just wait for the door to return
4201 if ( spawnflags & 1 )
4202 return 0;
4203 //get the door origin
4204 if (!trap_AAS_VectorForBSPEpairKey(ent, "origin", origin)) {
4205 VectorClear(origin);
4206 }
4207 //if the door is open or opening already
4208 if (!VectorCompare(origin, entinfo.origin))
4209 return 0;
4210 // store all the areas the door is in
4211 trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "model", model, sizeof(model));
4212 if (*model) {
4213 modelindex = atoi(model+1);
4214 if (modelindex) {
4215 BotModelMinsMaxs(modelindex, ET_MOVER, 0, absmins, absmaxs);
4216 //
4217 numareas = trap_AAS_BBoxAreas(absmins, absmaxs, areas, MAX_ACTIVATEAREAS*2);
4218 // store the areas with reachabilities first
4219 for (i = 0; i < numareas; i++) {
4220 if (activategoal->numareas >= MAX_ACTIVATEAREAS)
4221 break;
4222 if ( !trap_AAS_AreaReachability(areas[i]) ) {
4223 continue;
4224 }
4225 trap_AAS_AreaInfo(areas[i], &areainfo);
4226 if (areainfo.contents & AREACONTENTS_MOVER) {
4227 activategoal->areas[activategoal->numareas++] = areas[i];
4228 }
4229 }
4230 // store any remaining areas
4231 for (i = 0; i < numareas; i++) {
4232 if (activategoal->numareas >= MAX_ACTIVATEAREAS)
4233 break;
4234 if ( trap_AAS_AreaReachability(areas[i]) ) {
4235 continue;
4236 }
4237 trap_AAS_AreaInfo(areas[i], &areainfo);
4238 if (areainfo.contents & AREACONTENTS_MOVER) {
4239 activategoal->areas[activategoal->numareas++] = areas[i];
4240 }
4241 }
4242 }
4243 }
4244 }
4245 // if the bot is blocked by or standing on top of a button
4246 if (!strcmp(classname, "func_button")) {
4247 return 0;
4248 }
4249 // get the targetname so we can find an entity with a matching target
4250 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "targetname", targetname[0], sizeof(targetname[0]))) {
4251 if (bot_developer.integer) {
4252 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: entity with model \"%s\" has no targetname\n", model);
4253 }
4254 return 0;
4255 }
4256 // allow tree-like activation
4257 cur_entities[0] = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(0);
4258 for (i = 0; i >= 0 && i < 10;) {
4259 for (ent = cur_entities[i]; ent; ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(ent)) {
4260 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "target", target, sizeof(target))) continue;
4261 if (!strcmp(targetname[i], target)) {
4262 cur_entities[i] = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(ent);
4263 break;
4264 }
4265 }
4266 if (!ent) {
4267 if (bot_developer.integer) {
4268 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: no entity with target \"%s\"\n", targetname[i]);
4269 }
4270 i--;
4271 continue;
4272 }
4273 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "classname", classname, sizeof(classname))) {
4274 if (bot_developer.integer) {
4275 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: entity with target \"%s\" has no classname\n", targetname[i]);
4276 }
4277 continue;
4278 }
4279 // BSP button model
4280 if (!strcmp(classname, "func_button")) {
4281 //
4282 if (!BotFuncButtonActivateGoal(bs, ent, activategoal))
4283 continue;
4284 // if the bot tries to activate this button already
4285 if ( bs->activatestack && bs->activatestack->inuse &&
4286 bs->activatestack->goal.entitynum == activategoal->goal.entitynum &&
4287 bs->activatestack->time > FloatTime() &&
4288 bs->activatestack->start_time < FloatTime() - 2)
4289 continue;
4290 // if the bot is in a reachability area
4291 if ( trap_AAS_AreaReachability(bs->areanum) ) {
4292 // disable all areas the blocking entity is in
4293 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas( activategoal, qfalse );
4294 //
4295 t = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, activategoal->goal.areanum, bs->tfl);
4296 // if the button is not reachable
4297 if (!t) {
4298 continue;
4299 }
4300 activategoal->time = FloatTime() + t * 0.01 + 5;
4301 }
4302 return ent;
4303 }
4304 // invisible trigger multiple box
4305 else if (!strcmp(classname, "trigger_multiple")) {
4306 //
4307 if (!BotTriggerMultipleActivateGoal(bs, ent, activategoal))
4308 continue;
4309 // if the bot tries to activate this trigger already
4310 if ( bs->activatestack && bs->activatestack->inuse &&
4311 bs->activatestack->goal.entitynum == activategoal->goal.entitynum &&
4312 bs->activatestack->time > FloatTime() &&
4313 bs->activatestack->start_time < FloatTime() - 2)
4314 continue;
4315 // if the bot is in a reachability area
4316 if ( trap_AAS_AreaReachability(bs->areanum) ) {
4317 // disable all areas the blocking entity is in
4318 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas( activategoal, qfalse );
4319 //
4320 t = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, activategoal->goal.areanum, bs->tfl);
4321 // if the trigger is not reachable
4322 if (!t) {
4323 continue;
4324 }
4325 activategoal->time = FloatTime() + t * 0.01 + 5;
4326 }
4327 return ent;
4328 }
4329 else if (!strcmp(classname, "func_timer")) {
4330 // just skip the func_timer
4331 continue;
4332 }
4333 // the actual button or trigger might be linked through a target_relay or target_delay
4334 else if (!strcmp(classname, "target_relay") || !strcmp(classname, "target_delay")) {
4335 if (trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "targetname", targetname[i+1], sizeof(targetname[0]))) {
4336 i++;
4337 cur_entities[i] = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(0);
4338 }
4339 }
4340 }
4341#ifdef OBSTACLEDEBUG
4342 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "BotGetActivateGoal: no valid activator for entity with target \"%s\"\n", targetname[0]);
4343#endif
4344 return 0;
4345}

4347/*
4348==================
4349BotGoForActivateGoal
4350==================
4351*/
4352int BotGoForActivateGoal(bot_state_t *bs, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal) {
4353 aas_entityinfo_t activateinfo;
4354
4355 activategoal->inuse = qtrue;
4356 if (!activategoal->time)
4357 activategoal->time = FloatTime() + 10;
4358 activategoal->start_time = FloatTime();
4359 BotEntityInfo(activategoal->goal.entitynum, &activateinfo);
4360 VectorCopy(activateinfo.origin, activategoal->origin);
4361 //
4362 if (BotPushOntoActivateGoalStack(bs, activategoal)) {
4363 // enter the activate entity AI node
4364 AIEnter_Seek_ActivateEntity(bs, "BotGoForActivateGoal");
4365 return qtrue;
4366 }
4367 else {
4368 // enable any routing areas that were disabled
4369 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas(activategoal, qtrue);
4370 return qfalse;
4371 }
4372}

4379void BotPrintActivateGoalInfo(bot_state_t *bs, bot_activategoal_t *activategoal, int bspent) {

4382 char buf[128];

4397 activategoal->goal.origin[0],
4398 activategoal->goal.origin[1],
4399 activategoal->goal.origin[2],
4400 activategoal->goal.areanum);
4401 }
4402 trap_EA_Say(bs->client, buf);
4403}

4405/*
4406==================
4407BotRandomMove
4408==================
4409*/
4410void BotRandomMove(bot_state_t *bs, bot_moveresult_t *moveresult) {
4411 vec3_t dir, angles;
4412
4413 angles[0] = 0;
4414 angles[1] = random() * 360;
4415 angles[2] = 0;
4416 AngleVectors(angles, dir, NULL, NULL);
4417
4418 trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, dir, 400, MOVE_WALK);
4419
4420 moveresult->failure = qfalse;
4421 VectorCopy(dir, moveresult->movedir);
4422}
4423
4424/*
4425==================
4426BotAIBlocked
4427
4428Very basic handling of bots being blocked by other entities.
4429Check what kind of entity is blocking the bot and try to activate
4430it. If that's not an option then try to walk around or over the entity.
4431Before the bot ends in this part of the AI it should predict which doors to
4432open, which buttons to activate etc.
4433==================
4434*/
4435void BotAIBlocked(bot_state_t *bs, bot_moveresult_t *moveresult, int activate) {
4436#ifdef OBSTACLEDEBUG
4437 char netname[MAX_NETNAME];
4438#endif
4439 int movetype, bspent;
4440 vec3_t hordir, sideward, angles, up = {0, 0, 1};
4441 //vec3_t start, end, mins, maxs;
4442 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
4443 bot_activategoal_t activategoal;
4444
4445 // if the bot is not blocked by anything
4446 if (!moveresult->blocked) {
4447 bs->notblocked_time = FloatTime();
4448 return;
4449 }
4450 // if stuck in a solid area
4451 if ( moveresult->type == RESULTTYPE_INSOLIDAREA ) {
4452 // move in a random direction in the hope to get out
4453 BotRandomMove(bs, moveresult);
4454 //
4455 return;
4456 }
4457 // get info for the entity that is blocking the bot
4458 BotEntityInfo(moveresult->blockentity, &entinfo);
4459#ifdef OBSTACLEDEBUG
4460 ClientName(bs->client, netname, sizeof(netname));
4461 BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "%s: I'm blocked by model %d\n", netname, entinfo.modelindex);
4462#endif // OBSTACLEDEBUG
4463 // if blocked by a bsp model and the bot wants to activate it
4464 if (activate && entinfo.modelindex > 0 && entinfo.modelindex <= max_bspmodelindex) {
4465 // find the bsp entity which should be activated in order to get the blocking entity out of the way
4466 bspent = BotGetActivateGoal(bs, entinfo.number, &activategoal);
4467 if (bspent) {
4468 //
4469 if (bs->activatestack && !bs->activatestack->inuse)
4470 bs->activatestack = NULL;
4471 // if not already trying to activate this entity
4472 if (!BotIsGoingToActivateEntity(bs, activategoal.goal.entitynum)) {
4473 //
4474 BotGoForActivateGoal(bs, &activategoal);
4475 }
4476 // if ontop of an obstacle or
4477 // if the bot is not in a reachability area it'll still
4478 // need some dynamic obstacle avoidance, otherwise return
4479 if (!(moveresult->flags & MOVERESULT_ONTOPOFOBSTACLE) &&
4480 trap_AAS_AreaReachability(bs->areanum))
4481 return;
4482 }
4483 else {
4484 // enable any routing areas that were disabled
4485 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas(&activategoal, qtrue);
4486 }
4487 }
4488 // just some basic dynamic obstacle avoidance code
4489 hordir[0] = moveresult->movedir[0];
4490 hordir[1] = moveresult->movedir[1];
4491 hordir[2] = 0;
4492 // if no direction just take a random direction
4493 if (VectorNormalize(hordir) < 0.1) {
4494 VectorSet(angles, 0, 360 * random(), 0);
4495 AngleVectors(angles, hordir, NULL, NULL);
4496 }
4497 //
4498 //if (moveresult->flags & MOVERESULT_ONTOPOFOBSTACLE) movetype = MOVE_JUMP;
4499 //else
4500 movetype = MOVE_WALK;
4501 // if there's an obstacle at the bot's feet and head then
4502 // the bot might be able to crouch through
4503 //VectorCopy(bs->origin, start);
4504 //start[2] += 18;
4505 //VectorMA(start, 5, hordir, end);
4506 //VectorSet(mins, -16, -16, -24);
4507 //VectorSet(maxs, 16, 16, 4);
4508 //
4509 //bsptrace = AAS_Trace(start, mins, maxs, end, bs->entitynum, MASK_PLAYERSOLID);
4510 //if (bsptrace.fraction >= 1) movetype = MOVE_CROUCH;
4511 // get the sideward vector
4512 CrossProduct(hordir, up, sideward);
4513 //
4514 if (bs->flags & BFL_AVOIDRIGHT) VectorNegate(sideward, sideward);
4515 // try to crouch straight forward?
4516 if (movetype != MOVE_CROUCH || !trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, hordir, 400, movetype)) {
4517 // perform the movement
4518 if (!trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, sideward, 400, movetype)) {
4519 // flip the avoid direction flag
4520 bs->flags ^= BFL_AVOIDRIGHT;
4521 // flip the direction
4522 // VectorNegate(sideward, sideward);
4523 VectorMA(sideward, -1, hordir, sideward);
4524 // move in the other direction
4525 trap_BotMoveInDirection(bs->ms, sideward, 400, movetype);
4526 }
4527 }
4528 //
4529 if (bs->notblocked_time < FloatTime() - 0.4) {
4530 // just reset goals and hope the bot will go into another direction?
4531 // is this still needed??
4532 if (bs->ainode == AINode_Seek_NBG) bs->nbg_time = 0;
4533 else if (bs->ainode == AINode_Seek_LTG) bs->ltg_time = 0;
4534 }
4535}
4536
4537/*
4538==================
4539BotAIPredictObstacles
4540
4541Predict the route towards the goal and check if the bot
4542will be blocked by certain obstacles. When the bot has obstacles
4543on its path the bot should figure out if they can be removed
4544by activating certain entities.
4545==================
4546*/
4547int BotAIPredictObstacles(bot_state_t *bs, bot_goal_t *goal) {
4548 int modelnum, entitynum, bspent;
4549 bot_activategoal_t activategoal;
4550 aas_predictroute_t route;
4551
4552 if (!bot_predictobstacles.integer)
4553 return qfalse;
4554
4555 // always predict when the goal change or at regular intervals
4556 if (bs->predictobstacles_goalareanum == goal->areanum &&
4557 bs->predictobstacles_time > FloatTime() - 6) {
4558 return qfalse;
4559 }
4560 bs->predictobstacles_goalareanum = goal->areanum;
4561 bs->predictobstacles_time = FloatTime();
4562
4563 // predict at most 100 areas or 1 second ahead
4564 trap_AAS_PredictRoute(&route, bs->areanum, bs->origin,
4565 goal->areanum, bs->tfl, 100, 1000,
4566 RSE_USETRAVELTYPE|RSE_ENTERCONTENTS,
4567 AREACONTENTS_MOVER, TFL_BRIDGE, 0);
4568 // if bot has to travel through an area with a mover
4569 if (route.stopevent & RSE_ENTERCONTENTS) {
4570 // if the bot will run into a mover
4571 if (route.endcontents & AREACONTENTS_MOVER) {
4572 //NOTE: this only works with bspc 2.1 or higher
4573 modelnum = (route.endcontents & AREACONTENTS_MODELNUM) >> AREACONTENTS_MODELNUMSHIFT;
4574 if (modelnum) {
4575 //
4576 entitynum = BotModelMinsMaxs(modelnum, ET_MOVER, 0, NULL, NULL);
4577 if (entitynum) {
4578 //NOTE: BotGetActivateGoal already checks if the door is open or not
4579 bspent = BotGetActivateGoal(bs, entitynum, &activategoal);
4580 if (bspent) {
4581 //
4582 if (bs->activatestack && !bs->activatestack->inuse)
4583 bs->activatestack = NULL;
4584 // if not already trying to activate this entity
4585 if (!BotIsGoingToActivateEntity(bs, activategoal.goal.entitynum)) {
4586 //
4587 //BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "blocked by mover model %d, entity %d ?\n", modelnum, entitynum);
4588 //
4589 BotGoForActivateGoal(bs, &activategoal);
4590 return qtrue;
4591 }
4592 else {
4593 // enable any routing areas that were disabled
4594 BotEnableActivateGoalAreas(&activategoal, qtrue);
4595 }
4596 }
4597 }
4598 }
4599 }
4600 }
4601 else if (route.stopevent & RSE_USETRAVELTYPE) {
4602 if (route.endtravelflags & TFL_BRIDGE) {
4603 //FIXME: check if the bridge is available to travel over
4604 }
4605 }
4606 return qfalse;
4607}

4609/*
4610==================
4611BotCheckConsoleMessages
4612==================
4613*/
4614void BotCheckConsoleMessages(bot_state_t *bs) {
4615 char botname[MAX_NETNAME], message[MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE], netname[MAX_NETNAME], *ptr;
4616 float chat_reply;
4617 int context, handle;
4618 bot_consolemessage_t m;
4619 bot_match_t match;
4620
4621 //the name of this bot
4622 ClientName(bs->client, botname, sizeof(botname));
4623 //
4624 while((handle = trap_BotNextConsoleMessage(bs->cs, &m)) != 0) {
4625 //if the chat state is flooded with messages the bot will read them quickly
4626 if (trap_BotNumConsoleMessages(bs->cs) < 10) {
4627 //if it is a chat message the bot needs some time to read it
4628 if (m.type == CMS_CHAT && m.time > FloatTime() - (1 + random())) break;
4629 }
4630 //
4631 ptr = m.message;
4632 //if it is a chat message then don't unify white spaces and don't
4633 //replace synonyms in the netname
4634 if (m.type == CMS_CHAT) {
4635 //
4636 if (trap_BotFindMatch(m.message, &match, MTCONTEXT_REPLYCHAT)) {
4637 ptr = m.message + match.variables[MESSAGE].offset;
4638 }
4639 }
4640 //unify the white spaces in the message
4641 trap_UnifyWhiteSpaces(ptr);
4642 //replace synonyms in the right context
4643 context = BotSynonymContext(bs);
4644 trap_BotReplaceSynonyms(ptr, context);
4645 //if there's no match
4646 if (!BotMatchMessage(bs, m.message)) {
4647 //if it is a chat message
4648 if (m.type == CMS_CHAT && !bot_nochat.integer) {
4649 //
4650 if (!trap_BotFindMatch(m.message, &match, MTCONTEXT_REPLYCHAT)) {
4651 trap_BotRemoveConsoleMessage(bs->cs, handle);
4652 continue;
4653 }
4654 //don't use eliza chats with team messages
4655 if (match.subtype & ST_TEAM) {
4656 trap_BotRemoveConsoleMessage(bs->cs, handle);
4657 continue;
4658 }
4659 //
4660 trap_BotMatchVariable(&match, NETNAME, netname, sizeof(netname));
4661 trap_BotMatchVariable(&match, MESSAGE, message, sizeof(message));
4662 //if this is a message from the bot self
4663 if (bs->client == ClientFromName(netname)) {
4664 trap_BotRemoveConsoleMessage(bs->cs, handle);
4665 continue;
4666 }
4667 //unify the message
4668 trap_UnifyWhiteSpaces(message);
4669 //
4670 trap_Cvar_Update(&bot_testrchat);
4671 if (bot_testrchat.integer) {
4672 //
4673 trap_BotLibVarSet("bot_testrchat", "1");
4674 //if bot replies with a chat message
4675 if (trap_BotReplyChat(bs->cs, message, context, CONTEXT_REPLY,
4676 NULL, NULL,
4677 NULL, NULL,
4678 NULL, NULL,
4679 botname, netname)) {
4680 BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "------------------------\n");
4681 }
4682 else {
4683 BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "**** no valid reply ****\n");
4684 }
4685 }
4686 //if at a valid chat position and not chatting already and not in teamplay
4687 else if (bs->ainode != AINode_Stand && BotValidChatPosition(bs) && !TeamPlayIsOn()) {
4688 chat_reply = trap_Characteristic_BFloat(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_CHAT_REPLY, 0, 1);
4689 if (random() < 1.5 / (NumBots()+1) && random() < chat_reply) {
4690 //if bot replies with a chat message
4691 if (trap_BotReplyChat(bs->cs, message, context, CONTEXT_REPLY,
4692 NULL, NULL,
4693 NULL, NULL,
4694 NULL, NULL,
4695 botname, netname)) {
4696 //remove the console message
4697 trap_BotRemoveConsoleMessage(bs->cs, handle);
4698 bs->stand_time = FloatTime() + BotChatTime(bs);
4699 AIEnter_Stand(bs, "BotCheckConsoleMessages: reply chat");
4700 //EA_Say(bs->client, bs->cs.chatmessage);
4701 break;
4702 }
4703 }
4704 }
4705 }
4706 }
4707 //remove the console message
4708 trap_BotRemoveConsoleMessage(bs->cs, handle);
4709 }
4710}

4712/*
4713==================
4714BotCheckEvents
4715==================
4716*/
4717void BotCheckForGrenades(bot_state_t *bs, entityState_t *state) {
4718 // if this is not a grenade
4719 if (state->eType != ET_MISSILE || state->weapon != WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER)
4720 return;
4721 // try to avoid the grenade
4722 trap_BotAddAvoidSpot(bs->ms, state->pos.trBase, 160, AVOID_ALWAYS);
4723}

4725#ifdef MISSIONPACK
4726/*
4727==================
4728BotCheckForProxMines
4729==================
4730*/
4731void BotCheckForProxMines(bot_state_t *bs, entityState_t *state) {
4732 // if this is not a prox mine
4733 if (state->eType != ET_MISSILE || state->weapon != WP_PROX_LAUNCHER)
4734 return;
4735 // if this prox mine is from someone on our own team
4736 if (state->generic1 == BotTeam(bs))
4737 return;
4738 // if the bot doesn't have a weapon to deactivate the mine
4739 if (!(bs->inventory[INVENTORY_PLASMAGUN] > 0 && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_CELLS] > 0) &&
4740 !(bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETLAUNCHER] > 0 && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ROCKETS] > 0) &&
4741 !(bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFG10K] > 0 && bs->inventory[INVENTORY_BFGAMMO] > 0) ) {
4742 return;
4743 }
4744 // try to avoid the prox mine
4745 trap_BotAddAvoidSpot(bs->ms, state->pos.trBase, 160, AVOID_ALWAYS);
4746 //
4747 if (bs->numproxmines >= MAX_PROXMINES)
4748 return;
4749 bs->proxmines[bs->numproxmines] = state->number;
4750 bs->numproxmines++;
4751}

4770/*
4771==================
4772BotCheckEvents
4773==================
4774*/
4775void BotCheckEvents(bot_state_t *bs, entityState_t *state) {
4776 int event;
4777 char buf[128];
4778#ifdef MISSIONPACK
4779 aas_entityinfo_t entinfo;
4780#endif
4781
4782 //NOTE: this sucks, we're accessing the gentity_t directly
4783 //but there's no other fast way to do it right now
4784 if (bs->entityeventTime[state->number] == g_entities[state->number].eventTime) {
4785 return;
4786 }
4787 bs->entityeventTime[state->number] = g_entities[state->number].eventTime;
4788 //if it's an event only entity
4789 if (state->eType > ET_EVENTS) {
4790 event = (state->eType - ET_EVENTS) & ~EV_EVENT_BITS;
4791 }
4792 else {
4793 event = state->event & ~EV_EVENT_BITS;
4794 }
4795 //
4796 switch(event) {
4797 //client obituary event
4798 case EV_OBITUARY:
4799 {
4800 int target, attacker, mod;
4801
4802 target = state->otherEntityNum;
4803 attacker = state->otherEntityNum2;
4804 mod = state->eventParm;
4805 //
4806 if (target == bs->client) {
4807 bs->botdeathtype = mod;
4808 bs->lastkilledby = attacker;
4809 //
4810 if (target == attacker ||
4811 target == ENTITYNUM_NONE ||
4812 target == ENTITYNUM_WORLD) bs->botsuicide = qtrue;
4813 else bs->botsuicide = qfalse;
4814 //
4815 bs->num_deaths++;
4816 }
4817 //else if this client was killed by the bot
4818 else if (attacker == bs->client) {
4819 bs->enemydeathtype = mod;
4820 bs->lastkilledplayer = target;
4821 bs->killedenemy_time = FloatTime();
4822 //
4823 bs->num_kills++;
4824 }
4825 else if (attacker == bs->enemy && target == attacker) {
4826 bs->enemysuicide = qtrue;
4827 }
4828 //
4829#ifdef MISSIONPACK
4830 if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
4831 //
4832 BotEntityInfo(target, &entinfo);
4833 if ( entinfo.powerups & ( 1 << PW_NEUTRALFLAG ) ) {
4834 if (!BotSameTeam(bs, target)) {
4835 bs->neutralflagstatus = 3; //enemy dropped the flag
4836 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4837 }
4838 }
4839 }
4840#endif
4841 break;
4842 }
4843 case EV_GLOBAL_SOUND:
4844 {
4845 if (state->eventParm < 0 || state->eventParm >= MAX_SOUNDS) {
4846 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "EV_GLOBAL_SOUND: eventParm (%d) out of range\n", state->eventParm);
4847 break;
4848 }
4849 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_SOUNDS + state->eventParm, buf, sizeof(buf));
4850 /*
4851 if (!strcmp(buf, "sound/teamplay/flagret_red.wav")) {
4852 //red flag is returned
4853 bs->redflagstatus = 0;
4854 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4855 }
4856 else if (!strcmp(buf, "sound/teamplay/flagret_blu.wav")) {
4857 //blue flag is returned
4858 bs->blueflagstatus = 0;
4859 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4860 }
4861 else*/
4862#ifdef MISSIONPACK
4863 if (!strcmp(buf, "sound/items/kamikazerespawn.wav" )) {
4864 //the kamikaze respawned so dont avoid it
4865 BotDontAvoid(bs, "Kamikaze");
4866 }
4867 else
4868#endif
4869 if (!strcmp(buf, "sound/items/poweruprespawn.wav")) {
4870 //powerup respawned... go get it
4871 BotGoForPowerups(bs);
4872 }
4873 break;
4874 }
4875 case EV_GLOBAL_TEAM_SOUND:
4876 {
4877 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
4878 switch(state->eventParm) {
4879 case GTS_RED_CAPTURE:
4880 bs->blueflagstatus = 0;
4881 bs->redflagstatus = 0;
4882 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4883 break; //see BotMatch_CTF
4884 case GTS_BLUE_CAPTURE:
4885 bs->blueflagstatus = 0;
4886 bs->redflagstatus = 0;
4887 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4888 break; //see BotMatch_CTF
4889 case GTS_RED_RETURN:
4890 //blue flag is returned
4891 bs->blueflagstatus = 0;
4892 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4893 break;
4894 case GTS_BLUE_RETURN:
4895 //red flag is returned
4896 bs->redflagstatus = 0;
4897 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4898 break;
4899 case GTS_RED_TAKEN:
4900 //blue flag is taken
4901 bs->blueflagstatus = 1;
4902 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4903 break; //see BotMatch_CTF
4904 case GTS_BLUE_TAKEN:
4905 //red flag is taken
4906 bs->redflagstatus = 1;
4907 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4908 break; //see BotMatch_CTF
4909 }
4910 }
4911#ifdef MISSIONPACK
4912 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
4913 switch(state->eventParm) {
4914 case GTS_RED_CAPTURE:
4915 bs->neutralflagstatus = 0;
4916 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4917 break;
4918 case GTS_BLUE_CAPTURE:
4919 bs->neutralflagstatus = 0;
4920 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4921 break;
4922 case GTS_RED_RETURN:
4923 //flag has returned
4924 bs->neutralflagstatus = 0;
4925 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4926 break;
4927 case GTS_BLUE_RETURN:
4928 //flag has returned
4929 bs->neutralflagstatus = 0;
4930 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4931 break;
4932 case GTS_RED_TAKEN:
4933 bs->neutralflagstatus = BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_RED ? 2 : 1; //FIXME: check Team_TakeFlagSound in g_team.c
4934 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4935 break;
4936 case GTS_BLUE_TAKEN:
4937 bs->neutralflagstatus = BotTeam(bs) == TEAM_BLUE ? 2 : 1; //FIXME: check Team_TakeFlagSound in g_team.c
4938 bs->flagstatuschanged = qtrue;
4939 break;
4940 }
4941 }
4942#endif
4943 break;
4944 }
4945 case EV_PLAYER_TELEPORT_IN:
4946 {
4947 VectorCopy(state->origin, lastteleport_origin);
4948 lastteleport_time = FloatTime();
4949 break;
4950 }
4951 case EV_GENERAL_SOUND:
4952 {
4953 //if this sound is played on the bot
4954 if (state->number == bs->client) {
4955 if (state->eventParm < 0 || state->eventParm >= MAX_SOUNDS) {
4956 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "EV_GENERAL_SOUND: eventParm (%d) out of range\n", state->eventParm);
4957 break;
4958 }
4959 //check out the sound
4960 trap_GetConfigstring(CS_SOUNDS + state->eventParm, buf, sizeof(buf));
4961 //if falling into a death pit
4962 if (!strcmp(buf, "*falling1.wav")) {
4963 //if the bot has a personal teleporter
4964 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_TELEPORTER] > 0) {
4965 //use the holdable item
4966 trap_EA_Use(bs->client);
4967 }
4968 }
4969 }
4970 break;
4971 }
4972 case EV_FOOTSTEP:
4973 case EV_FOOTSTEP_METAL:
4974 case EV_FOOTSPLASH:
4975 case EV_FOOTWADE:
4976 case EV_SWIM:
4977 case EV_FALL_SHORT:
4978 case EV_FALL_MEDIUM:
4979 case EV_FALL_FAR:
4980 case EV_STEP_4:
4981 case EV_STEP_8:
4982 case EV_STEP_12:
4983 case EV_STEP_16:
4984 case EV_JUMP_PAD:
4985 case EV_JUMP:
4986 case EV_TAUNT:
4987 case EV_WATER_TOUCH:
4988 case EV_WATER_LEAVE:
4989 case EV_WATER_UNDER:
4990 case EV_WATER_CLEAR:
4991 case EV_ITEM_PICKUP:
4992 case EV_GLOBAL_ITEM_PICKUP:
4993 case EV_NOAMMO:
4994 case EV_CHANGE_WEAPON:
4995 case EV_FIRE_WEAPON:
4996 //FIXME: either add to sound queue or mark player as someone making noise
4997 break;
4998 case EV_USE_ITEM0:
4999 case EV_USE_ITEM1:
5000 case EV_USE_ITEM2:
5001 case EV_USE_ITEM3:
5002 case EV_USE_ITEM4:
5003 case EV_USE_ITEM5:
5004 case EV_USE_ITEM6:
5005 case EV_USE_ITEM7:
5006 case EV_USE_ITEM8:
5007 case EV_USE_ITEM9:
5008 case EV_USE_ITEM10:
5009 case EV_USE_ITEM11:
5010 case EV_USE_ITEM12:
5011 case EV_USE_ITEM13:
5012 case EV_USE_ITEM14:
5013 case EV_USE_ITEM15:
5014 break;
5015 }
5016}

5018/*
5019==================
5020BotCheckSnapshot
5021==================
5022*/
5023void BotCheckSnapshot(bot_state_t *bs) {
5024 int ent;
5025 entityState_t state;
5026
5027 //remove all avoid spots
5028 trap_BotAddAvoidSpot(bs->ms, vec3_origin, 0, AVOID_CLEAR);
5029 //reset kamikaze body
5030 bs->kamikazebody = 0;
5031 //reset number of proxmines
5032 bs->numproxmines = 0;
5033 //
5034 ent = 0;
5035 while( ( ent = BotAI_GetSnapshotEntity( bs->client, ent, &state ) ) != -1 ) {
5036 //check the entity state for events
5037 BotCheckEvents(bs, &state);
5038 //check for grenades the bot should avoid
5039 BotCheckForGrenades(bs, &state);
5040 //
5041#ifdef MISSIONPACK
5042 //check for proximity mines which the bot should deactivate
5043 BotCheckForProxMines(bs, &state);
5044 //check for dead bodies with the kamikaze effect which should be gibbed
5045 BotCheckForKamikazeBody(bs, &state);
5046#endif
5047 }
5048 //check the player state for events
5049 BotAI_GetEntityState(bs->client, &state);
5050 //copy the player state events to the entity state
5051 state.event = bs->cur_ps.externalEvent;
5052 state.eventParm = bs->cur_ps.externalEventParm;
5053 //
5054 BotCheckEvents(bs, &state);
5055}

5058==================
5059BotCheckAir
5060==================
5061*/
5062void BotCheckAir(bot_state_t *bs) {
5063 if (bs->inventory[INVENTORY_ENVIRONMENTSUIT] <= 0) {
5064 if (trap_AAS_PointContents(bs->eye) & (CONTENTS_WATER|CONTENTS_SLIME|CONTENTS_LAVA)) {
5065 return;
5066 }
5067 }
5068 bs->lastair_time = FloatTime();
5069}
5070
5071/*
5072==================
5073BotAlternateRoute
5074==================
5075*/
5076bot_goal_t *BotAlternateRoute(bot_state_t *bs, bot_goal_t *goal) {
5077 int t;
5078
5079 // if the bot has an alternative route goal
5080 if (bs->altroutegoal.areanum) {
5081 //
5082 if (bs->reachedaltroutegoal_time)
5083 return goal;
5084 // travel time towards alternative route goal
5085 t = trap_AAS_AreaTravelTimeToGoalArea(bs->areanum, bs->origin, bs->altroutegoal.areanum, bs->tfl);
5086 if (t && t < 20) {
5087 //BotAI_Print(PRT_MESSAGE, "reached alternate route goal\n");
5088 bs->reachedaltroutegoal_time = FloatTime();
5089 }
5090 memcpy(goal, &bs->altroutegoal, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
5091 return &bs->altroutegoal;
5092 }
5093 return goal;
5094}
5095
5096/*
5097==================
5098BotGetAlternateRouteGoal
5099==================
5100*/
5101int BotGetAlternateRouteGoal(bot_state_t *bs, int base) {
5102 aas_altroutegoal_t *altroutegoals;
5103 bot_goal_t *goal;
5104 int numaltroutegoals, rnd;
5105
5106 if (base == TEAM_RED) {
5107 altroutegoals = red_altroutegoals;
5108 numaltroutegoals = red_numaltroutegoals;
5109 }
5110 else {
5111 altroutegoals = blue_altroutegoals;
5112 numaltroutegoals = blue_numaltroutegoals;
5113 }
5114 if (!numaltroutegoals)
5115 return qfalse;
5116 rnd = (float) random() * numaltroutegoals;
5117 if (rnd >= numaltroutegoals)
5118 rnd = numaltroutegoals-1;
5119 goal = &bs->altroutegoal;
5120 goal->areanum = altroutegoals[rnd].areanum;
5121 VectorCopy(altroutegoals[rnd].origin, goal->origin);
5122 VectorSet(goal->mins, -8, -8, -8);
5123 VectorSet(goal->maxs, 8, 8, 8);
5124 goal->entitynum = 0;
5125 goal->iteminfo = 0;
5126 goal->number = 0;
5127 goal->flags = 0;
5128 //
5129 bs->reachedaltroutegoal_time = 0;
5130 return qtrue;
5131}

5215/*
5216==================
5217BotDeathmatchAI
5218==================
5219*/
5220void BotDeathmatchAI(bot_state_t *bs, float thinktime) {
5221 char gender[144], name[144];
5222 char userinfo[MAX_INFO_STRING];
5223 int i;
5224
5225 //if the bot has just been setup
5226 if (bs->setupcount > 0) {
5227 bs->setupcount--;
5228 if (bs->setupcount > 0) return;
5229 //get the gender characteristic
5230 trap_Characteristic_String(bs->character, CHARACTERISTIC_GENDER, gender, sizeof(gender));
5231 //set the bot gender
5232 trap_GetUserinfo(bs->client, userinfo, sizeof(userinfo));
5233 Info_SetValueForKey(userinfo, "sex", gender);
5234 trap_SetUserinfo(bs->client, userinfo);
5235 //set the chat gender
5236 if (gender[0] == 'm') trap_BotSetChatGender(bs->cs, CHAT_GENDERMALE);
5237 else if (gender[0] == 'f') trap_BotSetChatGender(bs->cs, CHAT_GENDERFEMALE);
5238 else trap_BotSetChatGender(bs->cs, CHAT_GENDERLESS);
5239 //set the chat name
5240 ClientName(bs->client, name, sizeof(name));
5241 trap_BotSetChatName(bs->cs, name, bs->client);
5242 //
5243 bs->lastframe_health = bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH];
5244 bs->lasthitcount = bs->cur_ps.persistant[PERS_HITS];
5245 //
5246 bs->setupcount = 0;
5247 //
5248 BotSetupAlternativeRouteGoals();
5249 }
5250 //no ideal view set
5251 bs->flags &= ~BFL_IDEALVIEWSET;
5252 //
5253 if (!BotIntermission(bs)) {
5254 //set the teleport time
5255 BotSetTeleportTime(bs);
5256 //update some inventory values
5257 BotUpdateInventory(bs);
5258 //check out the snapshot
5259 BotCheckSnapshot(bs);
5260 //check for air
5261 BotCheckAir(bs);
5262 }
5263 //check the console messages
5264 BotCheckConsoleMessages(bs);
5265 //if not in the intermission and not in observer mode
5266 if (!BotIntermission(bs) && !BotIsObserver(bs)) {
5267 //do team AI
5268 BotTeamAI(bs);
5269 }
5270 //if the bot has no ai node
5271 if (!bs->ainode) {
5272 AIEnter_Seek_LTG(bs, "BotDeathmatchAI: no ai node");
5273 }
5274 //if the bot entered the game less than 8 seconds ago
5275 if (!bs->entergamechat && bs->entergame_time > FloatTime() - 8) {
5276 if (BotChat_EnterGame(bs)) {
5277 bs->stand_time = FloatTime() + BotChatTime(bs);
5278 AIEnter_Stand(bs, "BotDeathmatchAI: chat enter game");
5279 }
5280 bs->entergamechat = qtrue;
5281 }
5282 //reset the node switches from the previous frame
5283 BotResetNodeSwitches();
5284 //execute AI nodes
5285 for (i = 0; i < MAX_NODESWITCHES; i++) {
5286 if (bs->ainode(bs)) break;
5287 }
5288 //if the bot removed itself :)
5289 if (!bs->inuse) return;
5290 //if the bot executed too many AI nodes
5291 if (i >= MAX_NODESWITCHES) {
5292 trap_BotDumpGoalStack(bs->gs);
5293 trap_BotDumpAvoidGoals(bs->gs);
5294 BotDumpNodeSwitches(bs);
5295 ClientName(bs->client, name, sizeof(name));
5296 BotAI_Print(PRT_ERROR, "%s at %1.1f switched more than %d AI nodes\n", name, FloatTime(), MAX_NODESWITCHES);
5297 }
5298 //
5299 bs->lastframe_health = bs->inventory[INVENTORY_HEALTH];
5300 bs->lasthitcount = bs->cur_ps.persistant[PERS_HITS];
5301}

5303/*
5304==================
5305BotSetEntityNumForGoalWithModel
5306==================
5307*/
5308void BotSetEntityNumForGoalWithModel(bot_goal_t *goal, int eType, char *modelname) {
5309 gentity_t *ent;
5310 int i, modelindex;
5311 vec3_t dir;
5312
5313 modelindex = G_ModelIndex( modelname );
5314 ent = &g_entities[0];
5315 for (i = 0; i < level.num_entities; i++, ent++) {
5316 if ( !ent->inuse ) {
5317 continue;
5318 }
5319 if ( eType && ent->s.eType != eType) {
5320 continue;
5321 }
5322 if (ent->s.modelindex != modelindex) {
5323 continue;
5324 }
5325 VectorSubtract(goal->origin, ent->s.origin, dir);
5326 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(10)) {
5327 goal->entitynum = i;
5328 return;
5329 }
5330 }
5331}

5333/*
5334==================
5335BotSetEntityNumForGoal
5336==================
5337*/
5338void BotSetEntityNumForGoal(bot_goal_t *goal, char *classname) {
5339 gentity_t *ent;
5340 int i;
5341 vec3_t dir;
5342
5343 ent = &g_entities[0];
5344 for (i = 0; i < level.num_entities; i++, ent++) {
5345 if ( !ent->inuse ) {
5346 continue;
5347 }
5348 if ( !Q_stricmp(ent->classname, classname) ) {
5349 continue;
5350 }
5351 VectorSubtract(goal->origin, ent->s.origin, dir);
5352 if (VectorLengthSquared(dir) < Square(10)) {
5353 goal->entitynum = i;
5354 return;
5355 }
5356 }
5357}

5359/*
5360==================
5361BotGoalForBSPEntity
5362==================
5363*/
5364int BotGoalForBSPEntity( char *classname, bot_goal_t *goal ) {
5365 char value[MAX_INFO_STRING];
5366 vec3_t origin, start, end;
5367 int ent, numareas, areas[10];
5368
5369 memset(goal, 0, sizeof(bot_goal_t));
5370 for (ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(0); ent; ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(ent)) {
5371 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "classname", value, sizeof(value)))
5372 continue;
5373 if (!strcmp(value, classname)) {
5374 if (!trap_AAS_VectorForBSPEpairKey(ent, "origin", origin))
5375 return qfalse;
5376 VectorCopy(origin, goal->origin);
5377 VectorCopy(origin, start);
5378 start[2] -= 32;
5379 VectorCopy(origin, end);
5380 end[2] += 32;
5381 numareas = trap_AAS_TraceAreas(start, end, areas, NULL, 10);
5382 if (!numareas)
5383 return qfalse;
5384 goal->areanum = areas[0];
5385 return qtrue;
5386 }
5387 }
5388 return qfalse;
5389}

5391/*
5392==================
5393BotSetupDeathmatchAI
5394==================
5395*/
5396void BotSetupDeathmatchAI(void) {
5397 int ent, modelnum;
5398 char model[128];
5399
5400 gametype = trap_Cvar_VariableIntegerValue("g_gametype");
5401
5402 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_rocketjump, "bot_rocketjump", "1", 0);
5403 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_grapple, "bot_grapple", "0", 0);
5404 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_fastchat, "bot_fastchat", "0", 0);
5405 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_nochat, "bot_nochat", "0", 0);
5406 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_testrchat, "bot_testrchat", "0", 0);
5407 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_challenge, "bot_challenge", "0", 0);
5408 trap_Cvar_Register(&bot_predictobstacles, "bot_predictobstacles", "1", 0);
5409 trap_Cvar_Register(&g_spSkill, "g_spSkill", "2", 0);
5410 //
5411 if (gametype == GT_CTF) {
5412 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Red Flag", &ctf_redflag) < 0)
5413 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "CTF without Red Flag\n");
5414 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Blue Flag", &ctf_blueflag) < 0)
5415 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "CTF without Blue Flag\n");
5416 }
5417#ifdef MISSIONPACK
5418 else if (gametype == GT_1FCTF) {
5419 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Neutral Flag", &ctf_neutralflag) < 0)
5420 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "One Flag CTF without Neutral Flag\n");
5421 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Red Flag", &ctf_redflag) < 0)
5422 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "One Flag CTF without Red Flag\n");
5423 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Blue Flag", &ctf_blueflag) < 0)
5424 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "One Flag CTF without Blue Flag\n");
5425 }
5426 else if (gametype == GT_OBELISK) {
5427 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Red Obelisk", &redobelisk) < 0)
5428 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "Overload without Red Obelisk\n");
5429 BotSetEntityNumForGoal(&redobelisk, "team_redobelisk");
5430 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Blue Obelisk", &blueobelisk) < 0)
5431 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "Overload without Blue Obelisk\n");
5432 BotSetEntityNumForGoal(&blueobelisk, "team_blueobelisk");
5433 }
5434 else if (gametype == GT_HARVESTER) {
5435 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Red Obelisk", &redobelisk) < 0)
5436 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "Harvester without Red Obelisk\n");
5437 BotSetEntityNumForGoal(&redobelisk, "team_redobelisk");
5438 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Blue Obelisk", &blueobelisk) < 0)
5439 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "Harvester without Blue Obelisk\n");
5440 BotSetEntityNumForGoal(&blueobelisk, "team_blueobelisk");
5441 if (trap_BotGetLevelItemGoal(-1, "Neutral Obelisk", &neutralobelisk) < 0)
5442 BotAI_Print(PRT_WARNING, "Harvester without Neutral Obelisk\n");
5443 BotSetEntityNumForGoal(&neutralobelisk, "team_neutralobelisk");
5444 }
5445#endif
5446
5447 max_bspmodelindex = 0;
5448 for (ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(0); ent; ent = trap_AAS_NextBSPEntity(ent)) {
5449 if (!trap_AAS_ValueForBSPEpairKey(ent, "model", model, sizeof(model))) continue;
5450 if (model[0] == '*') {
5451 modelnum = atoi(model+1);
5452 if (modelnum > max_bspmodelindex)
5453 max_bspmodelindex = modelnum;
5454 }
5455 }
5456 //initialize the waypoint heap
5457 BotInitWaypoints();
5458}
